ni gang du'ang lus can min/ /nang na gnas shing mtshon pa med/ /kun nas skye bo rgas pa na/ /rnam par 'gyur las nye bar dmigs/ /de bzhin lus la brten nas ni/ /las ni lus can dag la snang / /'bras bu dge dang mi dge'i rtags/ /skye bar yang ni rab brjod dang / /

rnam pa sna tshogs la nye bzang / /las rnams sna tshogs dag las byung / /dus tshod de bzhin 'gro ba dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs srog chags sgra/ /grub dang ma grub mtshan ma ni/ /rkyen gyi don la ltos pa yin/ /rgyu mtshan spyod dang mtshan ma ni/ /rkyen la mngon par rab tu brtag /

de bas rnam kun 'bad nas ni/ /rkyen la rag las bya ba yin/ /zlos pa'i sngags rnams rtag tu ni/ /grub pa rgyu la ltos pa yin/ /'di dag rkyen gyi yan lag ni/ /las ni bdag gir byed pas mtshon/ /mi mtshon sngags rnams thams cad ni/ /

bgegs las shin tu mi bzad 'gyur/ /de bas 'di dag thams cad kyi/ /yan lag tu ni thub pas gsungs/ /sa dbang rgyal po thams cad mkhyen/ /byang chub snying por ting 'dzin thob/ /sngags ni yongs su gsungs pa na/ /bgegs rnams ma lus rab tu

'jig /rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/ /bzod par dka' ba'ang rnam par 'joms/ /kun mkhyen bdag nyid chen po yi/ /de thugs byang chub la zhugs pa/ /ma rungs bdud kyi sems kyis ni/ /bgegs chen 'jigs par ga la 'gyur/ /de nas 'jigs pa chen po ni/ /

des ni rgyu mtshan med par snang / /rnam pa sna tshogs 'jigs pa rnams/ /de la rgyu mtshan med par 'byung / /de ni bsod nams stobs bskyed pa/ /yun ring dus su yongs su bsngags/ /de yi sngags kyi stobs kyis ni/ /de tshe bdud ni bcom par 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan

zhing brtson 'grus che/ /de ni 'od chen ldan par gyur/ /de yi sngags kyis mthu yis ni/ /byang chub dam pa thob par gyur/ /rmi lam ngan pa nyer 'jig pa/ /sngags de 'dir ni bshad par bya/ /gang dag sa la spyod pa yi/ /'byung po'i tshogs kun rab nyon cig /rmi lam

ngan pa bzod dka' dang / /ma rungs sems can zlog byed pa/ /rgyal ba sA la'i dbang po yi/ /sngon ni sngags rgyal yongs gsungs pa/ /lha yi tshogs dang gza' rnams dang / /rgyu skar skar mkhan rnams nyon cig /gza' dang rgyu skar skar ma rnams/ /ma rungs tshar gcad

don dang ni/ /'byung po rnams ni thams cad kyang / /zhi ba'i sems ni rab bskyed phyir/ /gang dag sa la spyod pa dag /rkang med rkang mang dag dang ni/ /rkang gnyis dang ni rkang bzhi dang / /mdor na sems can thams cad ni/ /'gro ba dang ni gnas pa yi/ /'byung po'i tshogs

rnams kun nyon cig /na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ kha kha khA hi khA hi hU~M hU~M dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha Sh+Ti phaT phaT swA hA/ gtsug tor 'bar ba zhes bsgrags pa'i/ /sngags 'di sngags rnams kun gyi mchog /gang zhig las rnams stong phrag ni/ /

dgu bcu rtsa bzhi dag dang ni/ /bkra shis thams cad 'dod pa yi/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las rnams byed/ /rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/ /lan cig bzlas pas sel bar byed/ /las rnams gzhan yang byed pa ni/ /sngags rnams kun gyi bdag po yin/ /'byung po

kun la dbang byed pa/ /bla ma mnga' bdag sangs rgyas 'di/ /sngags 'di dran pa tsam gyis ni/ /sngags rnams ma lus rab tu sems/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas pa lha yi lha/ /thub mchog gis ni de gsungs nas/ /yud tsam mi gsung bzhugs nas ni/ /cung zad dus ni bzhes

par mdzad/ /de tshe gnas gtsang gnas pa yi/ /lha tshogs dag kyang 'dug par 'gyur/ /lha rnams gtso bo thams cad ni/ /rgyu skar gza' dang skar ma rnams/ /gtsug tor sngags kyi byin rlabs kyis/ /'jigs shing dam tshig la gnas phyir/ /gtsug tor zhes bya

mthu bo che/ /mthu mnyam mthu ni chen po ste/ /brgya phrag lnga 'am bzhi 'am ni/ /de bzhin bdun nam brgyad dang dgu/ /gnyis dang drug dang lnga dang bdun/ /gtsug tor dbang por rab tu bsgrags/ /de ltar grangs dang grangs med ni/ /gtsug tor rgyal po dge ba yin/ /

de dag dang ni sngags 'di mtshungs/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ las bdag gir byas pa'i rkyen gyi le'u rab 'byam las bcu bdun pa

rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rgyu skar dang gza' dang skar ma dang skar mkhan thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa dang / phyogs thams cad du rnam par gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i mchog rnams la bka' stsal pa/

grogs po dag khyed cag nyon cig /gza' dang rgyu skar thams cad kyi mthu'i tshig khyed cag thams cad dag la yang ston cig /khyed kyi sngags bya ba'i don thams cad kyang sgrubs shig /khyed kyis dam tshig la yang gnas par gyis shig /sngags kyi rgyal

po 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bstan pa 'di grub na/ de nas gzhan cho ga'i rgyal po grub pa la yang khyed cag yid dad par gyis shig ces so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ gza' rnams kyi spyod pa sems can thams cad kyi don du gsungs te/ zlos pa thams cad la

phan pa'i phyir dang sngags kyi don yang rab tu bsgrubs pa'i phyir thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs so/ /tha skar dang ni bra nye dang / /smin drug dang po'i rgyu skar te/ /rgyu skar gsum po 'di dag la/ /mig dmar gza' ni bdag po yin/ /lug ni khyim du bstan

pa ste/ /'di la grub pa yod ma yin/ /grub mchog bar ma tha ma nyid/ /grub pa yin par 'dod pa yin/ /las rnams kun tu'ang mi 'gro zhing / /ma rungs gza' ni rnam par zlog /snar ma mgo dang de bzhin du/ /lag tu rgyu skar brjod pa yin/ /rgyu skar nab so rgyal

dang ni/ /skag tu'ang rab tu brjod pa yin/ /mchu dang de bzhin gre dang dbo/ /de bzhin me bzhi nag pa dang / /sa ri sa ga lha mtshams dang / /snron dang de bzhin snrubs dang ni/ /chu ni stod smad dge ba ste/ /zlos pa la phan rab tu bsngags/ /rgyu skar gro bzhin mon gru ni/ /drag po'i

las la rab tu bsngags/ /mon gre khrums ni stod smad gnyis/ /rgyu skar grub pa'i rgyu yin no/ /nam gru las skye dpal dang ldan/ /'thab la dga' zhing 'jigs pa med/ /rgyu skar lhag ma gtso bo ni/ /dus kyi tha mar 'byung ba min/ /byi bzhin legs par spyod pa dang / /grub dang

bsod nams rab tu bsgrags/ /nye rgyal dang ni tha dang / /'dod pa dag ni nyid yin no/ /yang dag bden dang 'jig rten dang / /snang bar yang ni brjod pa yin/ /longs spyod sbyin dang dge sbyin dang / /ma 'gags pa dang 'gags pa nyid/ /grags sbyin gzi brjid rgyal po dang / /

de bzhin rgyal po 'jig rten dang / /rgyu skar mang po gsungs pa ste/ /stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'o/ /dus kyi tha ma 'di la ni/ /'di dag gi ni nus pa yod/ /cho ga rgyal 'di bde don du/ /de tsam shes par gsungs pa yin/ /rang nyid 'od ldan sems can ni/ /de yi dus

su rdzogs ldan yin/ /thams cad nam mkha' la 'gro zhing / /rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs/ /de yi dus su rgyu skar med/ /nyi ma zla ba skar ma med/ /lha dang lha min 'jig rten med/ /dang po'i dus ni dus mchog yin/ /ming med rigs kyang yod ma yin/ /tshes dang skye

ba'i skar ma med/ /smyung ba med cing sngags kyang med/ /dge dang mi dge'i las kyang med/ /'di dag rang dgar spyod pa ste/ /bza' dang bza' bar bya ba'ang med/ /'di dag nad med dag pa ste/ /rtag tu sems can rnam mang po/ /de nas dus ni bri ba na/ /'jig rten snod min

rab tu 'jug /sngon gyi las kyis drangs nas ni/ /de nas sa yi steng du 'gro/ /sa steng lha gnas gzhal med khang / /lha dang lha min yang dag byung / /bar ma'i dus su phyin gyur nas/ /mi yi lus la yang dag brten/ /bza' dang btung la brkam chags pas/ /'od de dag ni

rab tu nyams/ /lus ni sra ba nyid gyur cing / /dge dang mi dge rnam par spyod/ /de nas nyin zhag zla ba dang / /gza' yi 'od ni byung bar gyur/ /de nas bzung nas gang cung zad/ /skar ma'i dpyad shes pa nyid dang / /sems can rjes su gzung bar brjod/ /ngas ni de dag bstan

pa yin/ /sngon ni drang srong cha byad gyur/ /blo ldan tshangs pa'i cha byad dang / /dbang phyug chen po'i lus bstan cing / /yang na khyab 'jug cha byad kyis/ /nam mkha' lding gi lus spyad dang / /gnod sbyin srin po dri za dang / /sha za dag gis lus nyid gyur/ /skye dang skye bar

bdag nyid skyes/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas par ni/ /de dang der ni skye ba la/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod don phyir/ /rtag tu skye ba'i dbang gis so/ /bdag nyid de tshe dus dag tu/ /sngon ni byang chub sems dpar gyur/ /mi shes mun pas bsgribs pa yi/ /bdag ni de tshe

byis par gyur/ /'jig rten ji snyed yod pa yi/ /khyab 'jug gis byas gzo spyad dang / /lugs kyi bstan bcos sngon gyi rabs/ /de bzhin rig byed brda sprod pa/ /sdeb sbyor skar ma'i dpyad nyid dang / /rtsis dang sgyu rtsal 'dod pa dang / /log shes de bzhin

shes pa dang / /de bzhin log par spyod nyid dang / /'jig rten bstan bcos thams cad ni/ /yun ring bdag gis sngon bstan to/ /zhi ba thub bdag ji lta bar/ /ye shes bdag gis thob ma yin/ /byang chub rgyu ni grol don dang / /de bzhin du ni thar pa'i phyir/ /'khor

ba'i btson rar rab bcings pas/ /las rnams las kyang bdag ma grol/ /zhi ba rnam rgyal sangs rgyas nyid/ /ma nyams go 'phang mya ngan 'das/ /yun ring don du mngon 'dod cing / /legs par yongs su btsal bas thob/ /de ltar bdag gis rig ldan pas/ /tshegs chung

bya bas thob pa yin/ /rgyal bas sngon ni bstan pas na/ /rang byung ye shes thob pa yin/ /de 'dra'i gnas ni rab mthong ba/ /phyi rol lam gyis thob ma yin/ /byang chub rgyu ni rnyed dka' bas/ /'khor ba'i dgon par 'khyams pa yin/ /bdag gi rang byung 'di 'dra ba/ /

ye shes bdag gis thob pa min/ /rig pa bzang po'i las dga' bas/ /da ni mya ngan 'das pa thob/ /bdag gis bstan bcos 'di dag ni/ /bsdus pa 'ba' zhig byas pa yin/ /las las grol ba med par ni/ /grub pa'i rgyu ni rnyed ma yin/ /'khor ba'i yun ring

zhags pa 'dis/ /las kyi 'ching bas nges par bcings/ /de yi 'gro 'di bdag nyid che/ /dge dang mi dge'ang smin par 'gyur/ /rgyu skar gza' dang skar ma'i dpyad/ /mtshon par byed pa kho nar zad/ /chos dang mi ldan mi rnams dang / /gzhan la rtags ni snang mi

'gyur/ /de nyid kyis na gza' gsungs pa/ /dge dang mi dge'i rjes gzung phyir/ /'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag dang / /khams ni bzhi po dag dang ni/ /chu dang sa dang rlung dang me/ /nam mkhar yongs su bstan pa yin/ /'byung ba yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir/ /'di dag 'byung

ba chen po yin/ /sems can yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir/ /bag med las kyis byas pa yin/ /de dag dus ni nges pa yis/ /sngags rnams grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /de yi skye ba 'bad pa yis/ /dge dang mi dge bsrung bar bya/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'jig rten gtso/ /

lha yi dbang phyug brgya byin sogs/ /de yang de tshe de dus su/ /dus kyi mthar ni yongs su brtags/ /dus kyi tha ma dag la ni/ /sngags rnams grub pa nges pa yin/ /de nyid kyis na thub dbang gis/ /gzhon nu yongs su brtags pa ni/ /shes rab chen po 'jam pa'i

dbyangs/ /byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs dang ldan/ /'jig rten 'dir ni kun tu rgyu/ /sems can rjes su gzung bar bzod/ /de yi dus su grub pa ni/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab tu mthong / /rgyu skar skar ma'i dpyad shes pa/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nyi shu rtsa

bdun rgyu skar dang / /yud tsam dag tu rab tu bsgrags/ /dus kyi tha ma de la ni/ /bcu gnyis khyim yang yod pa yin/ /rgyu skar tshogs la brten nas ni/ /de dag gza' ni rnam par dbye/ /thams cad so sor gyur pa ni/ /'jam dpal gyis ni so sor mdzad/ /skye ba dang ni

spyod pa nyid/ /khyim rnams kun la rab tu gnas/ /skye bo rmongs pas khyab 'gyur la/ /dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu 'byung / /de nyid las kyi 'ching ba yis/ /de dag khyim ni yang dang yang / /sems can rnams kyis grub pa tsam/ /dge dang mi dge rtog par byed/ /rgyu skar snar mar

ldan par ni/ /skye bar yongs su rab brtags pa/ /dpal ldan bzod pa phun sum tshogs/ /tshe ring bu ni mang ba dang / /rtag tu de tshe nor skal ldan/ /de ni dmag gi bdag po byed/ /'di ni khyu mchog khyim skyes na/ /khyu mchog nyid la yongs su 'chi/ /mgo nyid la ni

'jig rten shes/ /chos ldan mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/ /smin drug char skyes rtag tu ni/ /sa bdag rgyal por snang ba ste/ /yang dag skye ba de la brten/ /rtag tu rgya mtsho gsum bdag 'gyur/ /phyogs gcig skyes pa bgrod dka' ba'i/ /phyogs gcig rgyal por 'gyur ba

yin/ /gza' ni bla mas mtshan pa yi/ /gal te skye bar 'byung 'gyur na/ /sa ni khor yug ma lus par/ /rjes su spyod par 'gyur ba yin/ /lo ni bcu dang lnga po nyid/ /de yi rgyal thabs byed par 'gyur/ /tha skar bra nye nyid dang ni/ /smin drug cha las

skyes gyur pa/ /khyim 'di dag gi nus pa ni/ /tshong gi don gyis nor sgrub 'gyur/ /gal te skyes pa des byung na/ /dbang phyug longs spyod phun sum tshogs/ /rgyu skar 'di la skyes pa na/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyi ma nub pa na/ /de ni 'chi bar

'gyur ba yin/ /ma rungs tsham tshom med pa dang / /bden par smra ba ma yin dang / /lus kyi lpags srab dmar ba'i mdog /sa yi steng na de snang ngo / /'di yi 'gro ba skad cig ni/ /mig 'byed 'dzums su rab tu bstan/ /'di yi bar du gang skyes pa/ /rgya che yon tan de 'di

yin/ /se gol gtogs gnas tsam du ni/ /'di yi 'gro ba rab tu bstan/ /des na de dag 'gro ba nyams/ /gza' rnams kyis ni mthong ma yin/ /skye ba rnam par 'dris gyur pa'i/ /sems can rnam pa sna tshogs skye/ /'dres pa'i 'gro ba phun sum tshogs/ /'dren pa'i

longs spyod ldan pa yin/ /de nyid kyis na mi skye ste/ /skye ba nyid na brjod pa yin/ /skye ba'i skar ma sum cu ni/ /dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu 'byung / /gza' ni mig dmar gyis mtshan pa/ /'di ni ma rungs skye bar 'gyur/ /gsus che lus ni snum pa dang / /mig dkyus ring

zhing snyan par smra/ /gza' ni phur bus bltas pa ni/ /rtag tu brtan ldan skye bar 'gyur/ /chu tshod zung tsam nyi ma dang / /zla ba'i lha ni rab bshad pa/ /de bzhin rtag tu nyin mtshan la/ /yang dag skye bar 'dod pa yin/ /phyin ci log pa'i skye ba gzhan/ /phyin ci log tu'ang

brtags pa yin/ /gza' ni mi dge mthong ba dang / /mi dge'i skye ba dge mi dge/ /mi dge'i 'bras bu grub pa dang / /yang dag skye ba bzang po 'byung / /'gro ba'i skye gnas la brten nas/ /khyim la skye bar rab tu gnas/ /gza' ni ngan spong bus mtshan pa/ /sbyin

byed sems dpa' che ba ste/ /lag dang na ba so dag dang ni/ /skag gi cha la rab tu brjod/ /'di dag la skyes gtong ba che/ /g.yo sgyu can ni bab col byed/ /don dang don med 'byor ba la/ /rtag tu brkam chag bud med chags/ /gzhan gyi bud med mngon 'gro zhing / /

de nyid nag po la spyod dang / /dud pa'i mdog 'drar skye 'gyur te/ /drag cing 'khrig pa la yang dga'/ /sbyor ba'i khyim la rab brten nas/ /de ni spen pa dag la skye/ /nyin dang mtshan du yang dang yang / /der gnas spen pa rgyu bar byed/ /de las skyes pa nyi ma

phyed/ /sems ni stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de yi dus la gang skyes pa/ /de yi mtshan nyid brjod par bya/ /nor ni grub par 'gyur ba dang / /dbang phyug gis ni legs mtshan pa'o/ /rgyu skar de bzhin rgyal dang ni/ /skag la yang ni gang skyes pa/ /'di ni sbal

pa'i khyim yin te/ /dge dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che/ /mdog ni ser po dang ldan zhing / /de ni skye ba mchog tu bstan/ /rtag tu de bzhin mtshan phyed du/ /'di ni skye bar bstan pa yin/ /de yi dus kyi tshad la ni/ /gal te sems can skye bar 'dod/ /cho ga mthong ba'i

rgyu yis na/ /'di ni don rnams thams cad sgrub/ /de ni shin tu gzhon pa nas/ /rgyal thabs byed cing nor rnams thob/ /mdog ni ser dang sngo bsangs ni/ /kha dog rgyas pa snang bar 'gyur/ /gtsang sbra'i spyod la dga' ba dang / /de ni dpal ldan 'jigs med skye/ /mchu dang

de bzhin gre dang ni/ /de bzhin dbo yi cha dag ni/ /snang byed kyi ni zhing du 'gyur/ /seng ge'i khyim du bya ba yin/ /de la skyes pa dpa' bo che/ /sha yi kha zas de la dga'/ /ri yi rdzong la brten nas ni/ /rgyal thabs dbang phyug byed par 'gyur/ /gal te der skyes thob gyur na/ /

zhing la gnas shing des sdom rten/ /de bzhin nyi ma 'char ba na/ /skyes pa 'di la brjod pa yin/ /rgyu skar dbo yi cha dang ni/ /de bzhin me bzhi nag pa nyid/ /rgyu skar de la skye gnas pa/ /mi ni yongs su dpa' bar 'gyur/ /sdom min gzhan gyi bud med 'gro/ /de ni dmag dpon byed

par 'gyur/ /gal te skye ba thob 'gyur na/ /nges par rgyal thabs byed par 'gyur/ /gang du skar ma de dag gnas/ /'di ni bu mo'i khyim du 'gyur/ /'di yi bdag po gza' lhag ste/ /kha cig tu ni gzhan yang yin/ /'di dag skar ma mchog la ni/ /

gza' ni mi bzad bsrung bar 'gyur/ /zla ba yang ni bzang ba ste/ /yang na zla ba'i bu bdag yin/ /nyin phyed rdzogs na skye ba ni/ /'di yi skye bar snang ba yin/ /nag pa'i cha dang sa ri dang / /sa ga'i phyed kyis lhag pa la/ /srang gi khyim ste bzang po'i don/ /zla ba la

spyod sems can gyi/ /'di ni mi bzad zhing yin te/ /skal med ma yin nor gyi gnas/ /'di yi skye ba skye gyur gnas/ /mtshan mo'i thun gyi tha ma'o/ /mi ni 'di la skyes gyur pa/ /rtag tu btung ba dag la dad/ /spyi mtshan ma yin ngo tsha med/ /mang pos bkur cing mchod pa

dang / /la lar rgyal srid longs spyod dang / /nor chen thob par 'gyur ba yin/ /nges med skye ba yongs snang zhing / /byis par mas ni spangs pa yin/ /gal te skye ba thob 'gyur na/ /bu mang bde ba skye bar 'gyur/ /rgyu skar lha mtshams las skyes pa/ /bzo yi las

ni sgrub pa dang / /byams pa'i bdag nyid grogs po mang / /rtag tu dpa' zhing rtul phod che/ /'jig rten snron la skyes pa ni/ /mi ni rab gtum brtan pa yin/ /sdug bsngal mang po bzod pa dang / /mi ni ma rungs skye bar 'gyur/ /khyim ni sdig par bshad pa ste/ /rtag tu

rno zhing bab col byed/ /'di dag nyid la rtag skyes pa/ /skye bar yang dag brjod pa yin/ /de bzhin nyin phyed nyi ma la/ /gal te mi ni skye gyur na/ /drag cing g.yul las rnam rgyal ba'i/ /rgyal por de ni nges par 'gyur/ /byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs yod pa'i/ /de yi skad

cig gzas mthong 'gyur/ /sa yi lha mo'i bur gyur pa/ /gang yin de ni mig dmar gsungs/ /de nyid phyir na sa la spyod/ /rang bu nyid kyis gsod par byed/ /de las gzhan pa bzlog pas ni/ /dge dang mi dge'i skye ba nyid/ /tshe ring gzi brjid ldan pa dang / /shes ldan nyid

du'ang skye bar 'gyur/ /lha mtshams la ni rab skyes pa/ /shes rab che zhing grogs la byams/ /mig dmar gyi ni zhing 'di yin/ /yang na rtag tu gza' 'dres yin/ /rgyu skar snrubs las skyes pa dang / /de bzhin du ni chu stod dang / /chu smad kyi ni cha dag la/ /gzhu yi khyim

du rab tu bstan/ /de yi skye ba'i skye ba ni/ /phur bu'i zhing der brtan pa yin/ /nyi ma phyi dror gyur pa dang / /zla ba nam smad gyur pa la/ /de yi skye ba zhes bstan pa/ /gang zhig skyes pa skye ba'i rgyu/ /snrubs las skyes pa rang rigs 'jig /tha mar bzang por 'gyur ba yin/ /

skye gnas bar mar longs spyod ni/ /thob par de ni the tsom med/ /gzhon pa yongs su 'das pa na/ /snang byed dkyil 'khor ji lta bar/ /rgas par gyur na rgyal por 'gyur/ /longs spyod che zhing nor cher 'gyur/ /dma' ba'i phyogs su lus 'gyur gyi/ /gzhan gyi phyogs

su ma yin no/ /de las gzhan du bzlog par ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs skye bo snang / /chu smad kyi ni cha dag dang / /gro bzhin nyid du brtan pa dang / /mon gru rgyu skar mchog nyid ni/ /khyim 'di chu srin kho na yin/ /'di ni spen pa'i zhing yin te/ /yang na gza' gzhan gyis

mtshan pa'o/ /rtag tu 'di la skye gnas pa/ /de yang sa steng 'di la snang / /dang po'i mtha' dang bar ma'i mtha'/ /mtshan mo'i cha ni 'das pa la/ /de dag las skyes longs spyod cher/ /kun nas snang bar gyur pa yin/ /mtho dang dma' ba'i rigs gnas shing / /de dag

sa yi bdag por 'gyur/ /rab gtum kha dog nag po'am/ /sngo bsangs mdog tu de dag 'gyur/ /mig mtha' dmar zhing 'jam pa dang / /rtag tu dpa' zhing rtul yang phod/ /de bzhin chu yis khyab pa yi/ /phyogs su rgyal po byed par 'gyur/ /tshe ring bu ni med pa dang / /

sdug bsngal mang po bzod par 'gyur/ /de las gzhan pa bzlog pa la/ /skye bo rnam par bzlog pa snang / /mon gru'i phyed dang mon gre dang / /de bzhin khrums stod phyed dag ni/ /de yi khyim du 'gyur ba ni/ /bum pa zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /'di la gza' yi gtso bo ni/ /zhing du

rtag tu brten pa yin/ /de bzhin 'dres pa'ang zla ba dang / /blo ldan pa wa sangs nyid yin/ /'di dag skye bar 'gyur ba ni/ /mtshan mo'am nam ni langs par snang / /rtag tu skye 'di bzang po ste/ /'jig rten spyod pa dag pa yin/ /mi ni ma rungs las

byed cing / /blo dang ldan par brjod pa yin/ /longs spyod sna tshogs phun sum tshogs/ /sa steng rjes su spyod par 'gyur/ /de las gzhan du bzlog na ni/ /dbul zhing nad rnams snod du 'gyur/ /rgyu skar khrums smad nyid dang ni/ /nam gru zhes ni brjod pa dang / /khrums stod

kyi ni bzhi cha la/ /khyim ni nya ru rab tu brtags/ /skye ba de dag rtag gnas pa/ /kun tu ji ltar snang zhe na/ /mtshan mo'i thun gyi bar ma dang / /nyin par nyi ma shar ba dang / /nyi ma thun phyed 'das pa dang / /nyin phyed cung zad 'das pa dang / /lhag ma khru gang tsam 'das par/ /

'di yi dus su'ang skyes pa ni/ /dag pa dang ni rab dag nyid/ /pa sangs nyid kyis rab tu mchod/ /pa wa sangs kyi zhing zhes pa/ /lha yi rigs zhes tshangs par spyod/ /ser dang dkar ba'i mdog dag gi/ /gza' yis kyang ni rab tu bsten/ /des shing rtag tu dge ba dang / /

chos ldan mchog tu bzang ba yin/ /mi ni de la skyes gyur pa/ /yan lag kun kyang shin tu mdzes/ /brtson 'grus che zhing rgyal po 'dod/ /gnyen dang bshes ni brtan pa dang / /tshe ring longs spyod che ba dang / /dma' ba'i yul la yang dag brten/ /shar gyi phyogs la

brten nas ni/ /de dag rtag tu skye bar 'gyur/ /de dag mya ngam phyogs su ni/ /rtag tu skye bar mi 'gyur te/ /nya ni thang la yongs spyod par/ /nam yang snang ba ma yin no/ /drang srong rnams kyi chu gnas dang / /chu bo dag tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de la skye bar rab brtan pa/ /

khyim nyid du ni rab tu bstan/ /mi ni de dag las skyes pa/ /dma' ba'i yul du rnam par 'phel/ /rtag tu shar gyi phyogs gnas pa'i/ /sa bdag skal ba chen por 'gyur/ /phur bu dang ni spen pa dag /gza' mchog gi ni mngon par bltas/ /shar gyi phyogs kyi bdag po

byed/ /de dag las skyes the tshom med/ /khyim ni rnam pa mang po dang / /rgyu skar du ma gsungs pa yang / /rnam pa sna tshogs gza' mchog kyang / /sngon gyi dus yin da ltar min/ /mi rnams de las skyes pa yang / /de bzhin tshes grangs bco lnga dang / /nyin zhag sum

cu dag nyid de/ /des na zla bar rab tu bstan/ /zla phyed nyin mtshan bco lnga ste/ /zla phyed gnyis la zla bar brjod/ /des na zla ba bcu gnyis la/ /lo gcig tu ni rab tu bsgrags/ /'di tsam dus kyi tshod la ni/ /dus kyi tha mar yongs su brtags/ /rtsod pa'i dus

su phyin pa na/ /'di yi grangs su rab tu bstan/ /mi rnams tshe ni de bzhin du/ /lo brgya dag tu bsgrags pa yin/ /de dag lo tshigs phyin pa na/ /dus ni drug tu rab tu brjod/ /dang po bar dang tha mar ni/ /de dag gsum du rab tu bstan/ /lha mtshams la ni sa 'gul na/ /

mi rnams 'dir ni tshe ring 'gyur/ /de dag mi yi 'jig rten 'dir/ /skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin/ /mi ma yin pa 'jig rten 'dir/ /phan tshun du ni 'byer bar 'gyur/ /de dag rnam skrag 'jigs pa dang / /phan tshun du ni rnam par rgyu/ /lha dang lha min gtso bo ni/ /

gang tshe 'thab par rab 'jug pa/ /de tshe mi yi 'jig rten 'dir/ /nad ni 'byung bar byed pa yin/ /mjug las dang skar mda' dang / /gnam lcags dang ni rdo rje dang / /dud pa phyogs ni mtha' dag tu/ /du ba mjug rab tu snang / /zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor

la/ /mun nag gis ni khebs par gnas/ /nyi zla rdzu 'phrul chen po dag /bug pa yod par snang ba dang / /de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /rnam mang yang ni snang gyur na/ /mu ge tshe ni nyams pa dang / /de bzhin yul 'khor 'jig pa dang / /mi yi bdag po 'chi ba dang / /

sdom brtson 'jigs pa chen po 'byung / /'jig rten dag ni thams cad la/ /der ni 'jigs su rung ba 'byung / /mchu dang tha skar dag dang ni/ /nab so la ni sa 'gul na/ /de tshe dbus kyi yul dag tu/ /rkun ma bab col byed la gnod/ /lho yi phyogs la gnas pa yi/ /rgyal

po chen po rnam par 'jig /bra nye smin drug nyid dang ni/ /gang tshe snar ma dang ni mgo/ /'gul na 'jig rten 'jigs pa che/ /de la dogs pa rab tu 'byung / /nub phyogs na ni gnas pa yi/ /de tshe rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang yang mtha' 'khob

gnas pa yi/ /kla klo rku bas 'tsho byed dang / /de bzhin 'bigs byed steng gnas dang / /nang du mi yi dbang phyug gnas/ /de yang de yi dus dag tu/ /nad kyis brgyal zhing gnod par 'gyur/ /de dag la ni dgra rnams 'byung / /gcig la gcig ni yul 'phrog

'gyur/ /rgyu skar lag dang rgyal dang ni/ /skag dang de bzhin gre dang dbo/ /'di dag la ni sa 'gul na/ /mi bdag kun ni mi mthun nas/ /phan tshun gnod pa byed 'gyur ba/ /gsod dang 'ching dang gnod pa dang / /mu ge dag kyang rab tu 'byung / /me bzhi nag pa sa ri dang / /

de bzhin lha mtshams snron nyid la/ /snod kyi 'jig rten sar gyur pa/ /'di la gang tshe 'gul gyur na/ /kha ba can gnas kla klo dang / /rkun ma kun nas gnas pa dang / /bal yul gyi ni bdag po dang / /kha sha'i lung par gnas pa yi/ /der ni mi bdag ma lus pa/ /

phan tshun du ni mi mthun nas/ /thams cad g.yul la spyod 'gyur bar/ /'dir ni the tshom med pa yin/ /rgyu skar gang yin snrubs dang ni/ /chu ni stod smad gnyi ga la/ /sa yi steng du 'gul bar ni/ /'di dag la ni rab mthong na/ /shar gyi phyogs kyi mi rnams dang / /

pon dra o Ta kA ma ru/ /b+hang+ga la bdag rgyal po ni/ /'chi bar 'di la the tshom med/ /gau TA'i bdag po dpal dang ldan/ /yul 'khor gzhan gyis yongs bskor ba'am/ /'phral la na bar gyur pa dang / /la lar yang na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten rgya mtsho'i ngogs gnas

dang / /gang+gA'i 'gram du yang dag gnas/ /chu yis thams cad khyer ba'am/ /nad rnams mang po kun gnod byed/ /gro bzhin dang ni mon gru dang / /mon gre dang ni chu stod dang / /de bzhin du ni chu smad dang / /gal te nam gru las skyes pa/ /rab tu 'gul ba nyin phyed la/ /snod kyi 'jig

rten yang dag 'gul/ /sa rnams thams cad rab 'gul ba/ /ri bo dang ni nags su bcas/ /rtag tu nam mkha' la snang ba/ /'phar zhing 'og tu 'byung byed na/ /byang phyogs kyi ni yul dag dang / /nub phyogs la ni yang dag gnas/ /lho yi phyogs ni thams cad dang / /

phyogs rnams kun la gnas byed pa'i/ /mi mchog sa ni mang spyod pa/ /phan tshun du ni gnod pa byed/ /sems can rnams ni gnod chen ldan/ /mu ges yul 'khor 'byer bar 'gyur/ /tho rangs sa ni 'gul gyur na/ /lus can shis dang zhi bar 'gyur/ /de las cung zad

phyi dus na/ /drag po'i 'gul ba rab tu skye/ /de nas cung zad phyis 'gul na/ /yul ni ma ga d+hAr gnod dang / /ang+ga'i yul du gnod 'gyur te/ /ma ga d+hA rgyal de bzhin no/ /de nas cung zad nyin phyed dam/ /phyi dro'i dus su gyur pa na/ /gal te sa ni 'gul bar gyur/ /

sa steng ma lus nyid dag gi /rab tu byung ba thams cad la/ /rtag tu nad ni 'byung ba 'thob/ /rims dang yi ga 'chus dang gzer/ /de bzhin nad ni 'brum bu yis/ /zhag bdun btab par gyur nas ni/ /de nas de dag sos par 'gyur/ /de nas nyi ma yang 'das nas/ /

sa ni gal te 'gul gyur na/ /rigs bzhi dag gi mchog gyur pa/ /bram ze rtswa ni so ma 'thung / /nyon mongs rgyal po'i blon po ni/ /'chi bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /mdun na 'don ni chos dang ldan/ /blon po'am zham 'bring byed pa na/ /gzhan yang sdom can gtso bo ni/ /

sngags rgyud don la mkhas pa dang / /bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs dang / /de bzhin dmangs rigs rje'u rigs dang / /brtan pa mkhas pa dag dang ni/ /bstan bcos de nyid don lugs ldan/ /gsod dang rab tu nyams pa'am/ /dran ldan thos dang de nyid shes/ /sngon

byung ba ni sems pa dag /myur du nad kyis 'jigs 'gyur te/ /gnam lcags rdo rjes shing la bzhin/ /de nas nyi ma nub pa na/ /de nas yang ni song ba na/ /phyi dro dus kyi mtha' la ni/ /gal te sa ni rab tu 'gul/ /de bzhin sems can 'dres pa dang / /dud 'gro dag gi

'gro ba dang / /mi yi 'jig rten gtso bo dag /de tshe 'gum dang rnam par 'jig /mtshan mo'i thun ni dang po la/ /gal te sa ni 'gul gyur na/ /sems can 'dres pa sna tshogs dang / /dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams dang ni/ /mi ni 'jig rten gtso

rnams su/ /char chen rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /cung zad thun de bri gyur la/ /sa ni 'gul bar gyur pa yi/ /de tshe rtags de snang gyur na/ /rlung dang char pa'i 'jigs chen 'byung / /de nas thun de zad pa'i mthar/ /'gul snang las ni mi bzad pa/ /nub phyogs

mi yi bdag po yi/ /pha rol dmag tshogs 'byung bar shes/ /thun ni gnyis pa dang po la/ /gal te sa ni 'gul ba byung / /gzhan gyi dmag tshogs nad dang 'chi/ /khong pa'i nad ni mi bzad 'byung / /mkhris pa bad kan las gyur nad/ /skye bo rnams la 'byung bar

'gyur/ /'byung po rnams ni skyo 'gyur zhing / /de tshe phyogs dang phyogs su 'gro/ /de nas gnyis pa'i thun dkyil du/ /sa ni rab tu 'gul byung na/ /rlung chen 'byung bar shes bya ste/ /shing dang lha khang 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /yang thog ra ba ri rnams kyi/ /rtse mo

'jig par the tshom med/ /gnas dang 'dug gnas bzang po dang / /khang pa dang ni rta babs dang / /dud 'gro rnams kyi 'dug gnas kyang / /sa la myur du ltung bar 'gyur/ /de nas mtshan phyed dus dag tu/ /gal te sa ni 'gul ba byung / /de tshe shar phyogs yul

gyi bdag /mi mchog gtso bo 'chi ba'am/ /de bu 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am/ /mu ge 'byung bar rab tu ston/ /bar ma'i thun ni bri gyur nas/ /tha mar nye la 'gul ba byung / /sa rnams dag ni ma lus la/ /zhi zhing nad med nges par ston/ /de nas mtshan phyed mthar gyur

la/ /gal te sa ni 'gul bar snang / /gsher chen yul gyi dbus dag tu/ /mi yi bdag po nad kyis gnon/ /phan tshun mi mthun gyur nas ni/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad 'chi bar 'gyur/ /thun ni gsum par phyin nas 'gul/ /byis pa rnams la bde ba 'byung / /sbrang

bu sha sbrang phye leb dang / /rkun po rnams ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /tho rangs 'gul bar gyur na ni/ /tshe ring nad med lo legs byed/ /grong khyer gyi ni khor yug dag /me yis tshig par shes par bya/ /nyi ma 'char ba'i dus dag tu/ /sa ni rab tu 'gul ba byung / /dbus

kyi yul ni thams cad du/ /rkun mas rnam par 'tshe bar 'gyur/ /de tshe zhag ni bdun dag las/ /rgyal po 'chi bar snang ba yin/ /gang du stobs ni rab che ba/ /sa ni 'gul bar gyur pa yin/ /de tshe gnas ni de dag tu/ /dge dang mi dge'i spyod pa snang / /skar mda'

gnam grum sa 'gul ni/ /skar mda' dkar po 'bar gyur na/ /des ni sngar bstan sel bar byed/ /de bzhin dkar mdog rtag tu ni/ /dge zhing rab tu bsngags pa yin/ /mi bzad chen po kha dog dmar/ /me yis tshig par nye bar ston/ /dud ka'i mdog nag nag po ni/ /

rgyal po 'chi bar ston pa yin/ /ser ba'am yang na ser skya 'am/ /'dres pa'i mdog ni snang gyur na/ /de tshe 'dres pa'i las 'gyur ba/ /skar mda' ltung bas rnam par ston/ /gnam grum nyid du bstan pa ni/ /gar byung der ni ston pa ste/ /gal te dbus na de tshe dbus/ /

yul nyid du ni rab tu bstan/ /sgra brnyan snyan pa byung na ni/ /bde zhing nad med ston par byed/ /ma rungs mi bzad 'jig rten du/ /rnga sgra yis ni dge ba sbyin/ /'jigs dang shin tu 'jigs rung sgra/ /der ni mu ge ston pa yin/ /de la sogs par sbyor ba ni/ /rtag tu

gza' rnams 'dod pa yin/ /rgyu skar 'di dag mthong ba la/ /grub pa'i las ni de tshe bya/ /tha skar snar ma nyid dang ni/ /rgyal dang khrums ni stod smad gnyis/ /nam gru dang ni lha mtshams dag /bzlas pa'i dus su rab tu bsngags/ /'di dag la ni sngags rnams

'grub/ /grub pa'i don yang ster bar byed/ /skar ma dag ni 'di dag la/ /dkyil 'khor nyid kyang bri bar bya/ /gza' yi res kyi gtso bo ni/ /ser dang dkar bar snang ba yin/ /tshes ni 'di dag la dge ste/ /rtag tu zla ba nya ba yin/ /yul gzhan dag tu 'gro byed dang / /

dkyil 'khor dag kyang bri bar bya/ /dang po gsum pa lnga pa dang / /bcu pa dang ni bdun pa dang / /bcu gsum pa la ci bde bar/ /mi yi bdag po 'gro bar brtag /skye bo kun la dge ba sbyin/ /chas shing 'gro bar rab tu bsngags/ /dkyil 'khor

gyi ni sngags rgyud dag /sngags rnams thams cad mi bri'o/ /'di dag la ni sngags mi 'grub/ /bgegs kyi rgyur ni bstan pa yin/ /'gro dang sbyin sreg grub pa la/ /tshes grangs gza' ni dam par ldan/ /phur bu pa sangs zla ba dang / /gza' lhag mchog ni las

kun la/ /gza' mchog 'di dag rtag tu ni/ /bzhi po tshes dang ldan pa ni/ /sa steng 'jig rten kun tu ni/ /'gro ba'i las ni grub par byed/ /ma rungs 'chi ltas bral ba yi/ /nyi ma la ni brtag par bya/ /yud tsam bcu gnyis kho na ni/ /de yi dus su rab tu sbyar/ /

dkar dang byams ldan nyid dang ni/ /mig dmar du yang rab tu bstan/ /drag bu dbang chen dag pa dang / /byi bzhin nyid dang legs mdzes dang / /'khor dang 'khor bar byed pa nyid/ /dge ba sbyin zhes bstan pa yin/ /zla ba mchog ni sbyin pa nyid/ /'di dag bcu gnyis

mtshan nyid yin/ /yud tsam dag tu bstan pa ni/ /nyin zhag sum cu nyid la'o/ /bcu pa char ni 'bab 'gyur te/ /bcu bzhi pa ni yul 'khor 'jig /brgyad pa bcu gnyis pa nyid dang / /bzhi pa nyid ni spang bar bya/ /myur la sogs pa'i grangs dang ldan/ /mar

ngo la ni mtshan mo yin/ /lhag ma bgegs ni byed pa yang / /log 'dren yin te bzhi pa'o/ /'di dag grangs ni ldan pa la/ /dus 'di dag tu rab tu bstan/ /mig ni 'byed dang 'dzums pa dang / /se gol myur ba'i 'gros 'di ni/ /'di dag dus kyi tshad dag ni/ /rgya

cher yang ni bstan par bya/ /se gol brgya yi tshogs dag la/ /rtsa rgyun gcig tu bstan pa yin/ /rtsa rgyun bzhi la chu tshod bstan/ /chu tshod bzhi la thun zhes bya/ /thun bzhi la ni nyin par te/ /mtshan mo dag kyang de bzhin bstan/ /de ltar brgyad dang ldan pa la/ /nyin mtshan

du ni rab tu brtags/ /mig gi 'byed 'dzums bcu la ni/ /skad cig tsam du rab tu brtags/ /skad cig bcu zhes bshad pa ni/ /yud tsam du ni yongs su brtags/ /yud tsam bzhi la thun gcig ces/ /sngags rig pas ni yongs su brtags/ /'di tsam dus

kyi tshad la ni/ /gsum gyi grangs su yongs su brtags/ /sbyin sreg dus dang bzlas pa yi/ /grub pa'i dus dang sbyar bar bya/ /nyal ba'i dus dang mi nyal dang / /rtag tu nyin zhag phrugs btungs la/ /nyin dang mtshan ni nyi ma zhes/ /de ltar ming ni 'jug pa yin/ /

nyi ma lnga nyid la ni/ /zla ba phyed du rab tu bstan/ /zla phyed gnyis la zla ba zhes/ /rtsis shes 'jigs pa med pas bstan/ /de bzhin zla ba zla drug gis/ /sgra gcan gyis kyang 'dzin pa yin/ /de nas zla ba bcu gnyis la/ /lo yi sgrar ni rab tu bsgrags/ /de nas

lo ni bcu gnyis la/ /lo chen zhes ni de la bya/ /gza' dang rgyu skar phyin ci log /lha min dbang po thams cad kyang / /de nas lo ni bcu gnyis la/ /'dir ni dge dang mi dge byed/ /gang tshe yar ngor lha min dbang / /sgra gcan rab tu snang 'gyur zhing / /zla ba nyi ma'i

dkyil 'khor ni/ /ma lus rab tu zin gyur na/ /mtshon gyi tshogs ni chen po yang / /sa yi steng du snang bar 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa chen po ni/ /dus dang dus su rab sbyor 'gyur/ /rnam pa du ma mang po yi/ /bgegs ni mi bzad snang bar 'gyur/ /dus kyi

tha mar phyin pa na/ /'jig rten snod ni chos min la/ /rgyu skar snrubs la gnas pa la/ /zla ba ma lus 'dzin 'gyur zhing / /mtshan mo ma lus 'dzin pa nyid/ /zla ba 'dzin pa nub bzhin dang / /gal te nyi ma nyin par ni/ /nub bzhin du ni 'dzin 'gyur dang / /nyi ma

dang ni zla ba nyid/ /mtshan phyed dag tu gzung gyur nas/ /lha min dbang po'i grib ma yis/ /gal te 'jigs shing nub gyur na/ /shar phyogs gnas pa'i rgyal po ni/ /sdang bas gsod par the tshom med/ /rang nyid 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas sam/ /gzhan gyis de ni

gsod par 'gyur/ /kla klo yi ni bdag po nyid/ /shar phyogs su ni gsod par byed/ /o Da'i yul gyi mi rnams dang / /de tshe rdo rje zhes bdag kyang / /gal te tha skar snar ma dang / /de bzhin du ni bra nye dang / /smin drug dag la nyi zla ni/ /gang tshe

'dzin par snang 'gyur na/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bad kan dang / /mkhris pa dang ni rlung gyur dang / /de bzhin 'dres par gyur pa ni/ /gzhan yang lus can kun la 'byung / /byis pa dag ni thams cad la/ /rnam pa du ma'i nad rnams 'byung / /gal te rgyu skar mchu

dang ni/ /gre dang de bzhin dbo nyid dang / /me bzhi nag pa sa ri dang / /sa ga dag gi rgyu skar ni/ /de la nyi zla shar ba na/ /'dzin par the tshom med 'gyur zhing / /nyi zla gnyis ni shar phyogs su/ /sgra gcan gyis ni zin gyur na/ /shar phyogs mi yi bdag po

dang / /lA Da yul gyi bdag po dang / /ang+ga ma ga d+hA rgyal po/ /mig gi nad kyis 'debs pa'am/ /bu rnams 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am/ /de rnams 'chi bas nyer 'jigs 'gyur/ /dgra rnams sdang ba'i sems ldan pa'i/ /tshogs kyang de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur/ /

mgo dang lag dang nab so dang / /de bzhin rgyal dang skag nyid dang / /nyi ma zla ba 'di dag la/ /sgra gcan gyis zin snang gyur na/ /ma ga d+hA rgyal gnod 'gyur zhing / /de bzhin yul mi dag la'ang gnod/ /blon po nad 'jigs shes par bya/ /'ching dang nyon mongs grong

khyer 'gyur/ /lha mtshams dang ni snron dag la/ /sgra gcan gyis zin kun la snang / /de tshe nad rnams kun tu 'gro/ /yul mi kun la'ang nad rnams 'byung / /gsod dang 'ching dang nyon mongs dang / /gnod pa rnam pa du ma 'byung / /'ching dang gzhan gyi dmag tshogs

ni/ /skye bo'i gtso la de dag skye/ /chu stod dang ni gro bzhin dang / /de bzhin chu smad kho na la/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas dang / /zla ba la ni dmar bar snang / /gza' ni 'dzin par snang gyur pa/ /rtag tu mu ge 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gro bzhin mon gre'i rgyu skar dang / /

de bzhin du ni khrums stod dang / /gang tshe mon gru dag la ni/ /gal te nyi zla gzas zin te/ /gza' ni byung bar shes gyur na/ /kha dog nag pa la brten nas/ /mya ngan chen po nyon mongs dang / /mu ge kun tu 'byung bar ni/ /yul mi kun la 'byung ba dang / /

rgyal po rkun ma'i 'jigs chen 'byung / /nam gru rgyu skar nyid dang ni/ /gang tshe khrums smad dag la ni/ /zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /shar nas sgra gcan 'dzin pa na/ /nub phyogs nas ni nyi ma 'dzin/ /ma ga d+hAr ni mi yi bdag /sems can rgyal po'i thabs

nyams par/ /zla phyed gcig gis snang bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu sgra gcan 'gro ba yi/ /mtshan ma 'di dag bstan pa yin/ /zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /phyogs ni gang nas zin gyur pa/ /de dang de yi phyogs dag tu/ /dge dang mi dge 'byung bar 'gyur/ /

gang nyid sa steng 'gul ba ni/ /'jig rten mtshan mas bstan pa dag /dge dang mi dge de dang der/ /de bzhin gzas zin shes par bya/ /khug rna ser ba mjug ni/ /nyi ma lnga yi bar du yod/ /de 'og 'jig rten sems las 'byung / /ngogs la spyod cing gnas

pa yi/ /yul mi thams cad 'jig 'gyur zhing / /nad kyi gzhi ni 'byung ba yin/ /byang phyogs gang gA'i 'gram gyi ni/ /rgyal po dag kyang 'jig par 'gyur/ /de bzhin kha ba can gyi dbus/ /bgrod dka' khrad khrod la gnas dang / /sa yi bdag po la gnas dang / /kho ra

yug na rtse rje dang / /byang phyogs gang gA'i 'gram dag na/ /de tshe 'gram spyod bdag po dag /mya ngan gdung ba du ma yis/ /skye bo'i bdag po de 'ching 'gyur/ /rgyu skar gang la sa 'gul ba/ /de la khug rna yang dag bstan/ /phyogs rnams ma lus khug rna ni/ /mi

bzad 'od ni spangs pa dang / /nyin zhag lnga yi bar du yang / /rtag tu nyin zhag mang por ni/ /phan tshun chos ni mi mthong dang / /mi yi spyod yul mthong ba min/ /mi rnams dag ni phan tshun du/ /der ni mthong bar 'gyur ma yin/ /der ni 'jig chen 'byung bar shes/ /rgyal

po yul 'khor bcas te 'jig /skar mda' 'khor yug dag tu ni/ /gang dag las kyis byung gyur pa/ /phyogs kyi mthar ni rab snang ba/ /gnyis dang gsum ni mi bzad yin/ /mtshan mo dbang po'i gzhu nyid dang / /bya rog gal te 'dab ma dkar/ /

dkar ba'am yang na kha dog nag /yang na dkar dang nag par mthong / /phyin log 'dab chags kha dog dang / /phyin ci log gi dus sgra dang / /phyin ci log gi bya rnams yod/ /gang du der ni 'jigs chen 'byung / /rkang gnyis rkang pa bzhi nyid dang / /rkang med dang

ni rkang mang dang / /'dab chags dud 'gro srog chags rnams/ /phyin ci log 'gyur 'jigs chen byung / /khyi ni gyen du gdong bltas te/ /yang dang yang du zugs gyur pa/ /nyin par ram ni mtshan mo ru/ /gang du der ni 'jigs chen 'byung / /de ltar rnam pa du ma

dang / /rnam mang gang du rab brtags pa/ /der ni char mi 'bab par 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i tshogs kyang rnam par 'jig /ji ltar skye ba'i skar ma ni/ /dge dang mi dge'i srog chags yin/ /de bzhin mtshan ma gang skyes pa/ /dge dang mi dge byed pa yin/ /

sngon gyi rgyu ni ma yin pa/ /rgyu mtshan cung zad mi mthong ste/ /rgyu med rab tu 'jug byed pa'i/ /bgegs 'byung ba ni yod ma yin/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ skar

ma'i dpyad kyi rgyu mtshan shes pa'i le'u rab 'byam las brgyad pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gza' dang rgyu skar dang skar ma dang skar mkhan gyi tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kye kye gza' dang rgyu skar kyi tshogs rnams khyed cag thams

cad nyon cig /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i cho ga'i rgyal po 'di las 'da' bar ma byed cig /sngags dang / rgyud dang / dbang bskur ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga rnams dang / bzlas pa dang / nges par sdom pa dang / rig pa sgrub pa la 'jug pa dang /

rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi cho ga dang / rgyu skar kyi spyod pa dang / rtsis mngon par shes pa rnams kyi cho ga'i rgyal po de la khyed cag rnams kyis der bgegs ma byed cig /bstan pa la rab tu zhugs pa rnams la lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang de la srung bgyis shig /

sems can ma rungs pa thams cad kyang dgag par gyis shig /bstan par gyis shig /thams cad kyi thams cad du gsod par ma byed cig /stobs bcu dang ldan pa rnams kyi bstan pa la rnam par gzhag par gyis shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub

pas sems can thams cad kyi ma rungs pa thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ phyogs

bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rnam par bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na bzhugs pa la rnam par blta ba'i phyir nye bar lhags par gyur to/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas nye bar

lhags pa rang rang gi byin gyis brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la bos te/ gsungs shig gsungs shig dpa' bo che/ /'jig rten rnams la'ang phan pa'i phyir/ /sngags rgyud cho ga ji lta bar/ /sngags rnams kun la rab 'jug phyir/ /rig pa'i

rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi/ /gtso mchog yi ge gcig pa ni/ /dus nyams rtsod pa'i dus dag tu/ /sngags rnams kun gyi rab mchog ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yin/ /gtsug tor rgyal po stobs po che/ /

'byung po kun ni zlog par byed/ /gza' dang rgyu skar ma mo rnams/ /ma rungs sems ldan 'gog par byed/ /'jig rten bgegs rnams ji snyed dang / /de bzhin gzhan yang gdug sems ldan/ /sems can rnams ni rjes gzung dang / /zlos pa rnams ni bde bya'i

phyir/ /bstan pa 'di la cho ga mchog /stobs chen 'khor los sgyur ba yin/ /gtsug tor rgyal po mthu bo che/ /kun la dbang phyug dam pa ni/ /gang gi dus ni 'di yin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis gsungs/ /de skad gsungs

nas sangs rgyas rnams/ /mi gsung bar ni bzhugs par gyur/ /de nas sangs rgyas 'dus pa de rnams kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad snod kyi 'jig rten rnams gcig tu 'bar bar gyur la/ sangs rgyas

kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis sems can gcig la yang gnod par ma gyur te/ snang ba chen po yang dag par snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs te/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang de na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor chen po 'dus pa la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems

dpa' rnams dgongs su gsol/ yi ge gcig pa 'di ni rig pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gong nas gong du gnas pa bstan pa thogs pa med pa/ dpag tu med pa'i stobs dang pha rol gnon pa/ bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor

gyi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba'i cho ga yang ngas bshad par bya'o/ /bstan pa nub pa'i dus su rtsod pa'i dus 'di la bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba de bstan pa 'di la srung ba gcig pur 'gyur zhing dus thams cad du grub par yang 'gro ste/ sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi bstan pa nub pa'i dus tshod la 'di nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin te/ bstan pa'i don byed par 'gyur ro/ /yi ge gcig po 'di la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod 'dus par 'gyur ro/ /kye lha'i tshogs dang sems can thams

cad nyon cig /b+h+rUM/ bcom ldan 'di ni thams cad mkhyen/ /sangs rgyas sngags gzugs rnam par gnas/ /ston pa thugs rje che dang ldan/ /sems can kun la rnam par spyod/ /sngags rnams bdag po dpal dang ldan/ /gtsug tor las byung bstan pa

yin/ /snying rje dbang la brten nas ni/ /'di ni yi ge gcig tu gnas/ /chos kyi dbyings la brten nas ni/ /'di ni sna tshogs gzugs la gnas/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas sku rnams ni/ /skye bo rnams la sku gdung gyur/ /'jig rten gyis mchod zang zing

bcas/ /zang zing med pa'ang khyad par du/ /dam chos sku gdung dag tu bstan/ /'jig rten zang zing med pa'i rgyu/ /sku ni zang zing bcas par gsungs/ /thub pa'i zla ba zag pa med/ /zang zing bcas dang zang zing med/ /'jig rten rgyur ni gsungs

pa yin/ /chos kyi dbyings la brten nas ni/ /thugs rje'i dbang gis sems can la/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa/ /sngags kyi tshul gyis bzhugs pa yin/ /sna tshogs gzugs can thams cad mkhyen/ /sa steng 'di la snang ba yin/ /sems can rnams

kyis sngags sgrub pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yin/ /sngags 'di yongs su mdor bsdu na/ /rang gis cho gas 'dir bzlas na/ /sngags rnams ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/ /rtag tu 'bras bcas byed par 'gyur/ /'di yi cho ga mdor bsdus nas/ /

dus su yang ni bshad par bya/ /dus mthar thub mchog 'jig rten du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nub pa na/ /de yi dus su cho ga 'grub/ /sngags 'grub par ni gsungs pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor

gzhan gyi las kyis sbyor ba rnam par 'jig par byed pa/ ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba/ sngags thams cad kyi bdag po/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis don du gnyer ba gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i cho ga yi ge gcig pa sngar rgya cher bstan nas/ yang mdor na re

zhig dang po bzlas pas gang du gnas pa las/ dpag tshad lnga'i nang nas ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /grub pa thams cad kyang nus pa med par 'gyur zhing lha thams cad kyi nus pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa po'i

'dod pa ma gtogs par lha thams cad kyang gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa po gzhan rnams kyis grub pa 'phrog par byed cing / gzhan gyi sbyor bas gsang sngags bcad pa dang bcom pa dang phur bus btab pa'ang thar bar

byed do/ /bdag gis gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod par 'dod na/ rtswa ku sha sngon po chang pa gang blangs la/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas mtshon gyis bcad na/ rig pa gang gi phyir dmigs te bcad pa de gcod par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs

brnyan byas te 'dis seng ldeng gi phur pas snying la btab na gnad la bab par 'gyur ro/ /le brgan du btsos pa'i skud pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa bor na bcing bar 'gyur ro/ /kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te kha bkab pa byas na rengs

par 'gyur ro/ /mtshon chas snying dum bu gnyis su byas na gnyis su gas par 'gyur ro/ /ske tshe la dug dang khrag gis btags pas bsku ba byas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /ka ra bI ra'i lcug mas kun tu brdeg na gnod par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan gyi rig pa thams cad la

mngon spyod bya ba ni ci dgar byar rung ngo / /sngar gsungs pa'i las thams cad la 'o mas khrus byas nas sbyin sreg byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mar gyi sbyin sreg gis ni thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing nyams rtas pa byas par yang 'gyur ro/ /khu tshur bcings pas sngags thams

cad rengs par 'gyur ro/ /yid kyis ni dgrol bar bsams pas bkrol bar 'gyur ro/ /sngags sgrub par 'dod pas kyang 'di nyid kyis bcing ba byas te bsgrub par bya'o/ /cho ga gang sgrub par 'dod pas kyang de nyid 'dis bsgrub par bya'o/ sngags sgrub pa dang 'di nyid kyi

sngags kyis spyan drang ba bya ba dang yang slar gshegs su gsol ba bya ba yin no/ /gang 'di nyid kyis srung bar byed pa thub par dka' bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gis sngags 'di ma grub bam lan ma thob na 'di nyid dang lhan cig tu bzlas brjod byas na/ myur du 'grub

bam lan thob cing / gal te ma grub bam lan ma byin na de ring por mi thogs pa nyid du 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /sngags gang la dmigs te zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis til la btags te brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg dus gsum du zhag bdun byas pa de 'di'i dbang du 'gyur zhing /

gang brjod pa de'i las byed par 'gyur ba'am lan thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha dbang du bya bar 'dod na thang shing gi yam shing gi brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na zhag bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro/ /klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na mngar gsum gyi sbyin sreg bya'o/ /dri za dang dri za mo

thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod na shing mya ngan med pa dang pri yang ku'i yam shing ngam me tog gi sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin mo dang klu mo'i gdon rnams la ni ske tshes bya'o/ /rgyal po rnams la ni yungs dkar gyi bya'o/ /bram ze rnams la ni me tog gi

sbyin sreg bya'o/ /rje'u rigs la ni zho dang 'o ma dang mar gyi bya'o/ /dmangs rigs la ni phub ma'i rdul gyi bya'o/ /bud med la ni lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /gdol pa la ni mon sran gre'u dang dzam bu li ka'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /bu mo gzhon nu ma la ni 'bras yos kyi

sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la ni mar dang til gyi sbyin sreg byas na dbang du byed do/ /thams cad du yang dus gsum du zhag bdun du bya'o zhes gsungs nas/ rgyal ba'i mchog cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /thub mchog bdun pas sngags 'di ni/ /de tshe

lha yi tshogs la gsungs/ /'jig rten chos shes grol ba dang / /de tshe de ni chags bral zlos/ /de tshe thub pa mchog gis ni/ /sangs rgyas sras po thu bo lha/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /'jam dpal la ni de tshe gsung / /lha yi lha ni blo ldan pa/ /

mgon po 'khor lo'i bdag po yi/ /cho ga 'di ni rgya che bas/ /gang gi bskal pa'i tshad du yang / /rgyal bas kyang ni bshad mi nus/ /mi rnams la ni phan pa'i phyir/ /cho ga yi ni phyogs gcig tsam/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin/ /

de tshe de skad gsungs nas ni/ /dpal ldan 'jam dbyangs rdzu 'phrul che/ /gtsang ma'i gnas kyi steng bzhugs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas de la skul bar byed/ /gsungs shig gsungs shig dpa' bo che/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /dus mtha' 'jigs

pa'i dus su ni/ /mi rnams bde ba skyed pa'i phyir/ /mthu chen sngags kyi rgyal po ste/ /gzi brjid chen po 'di yis ni/ /ras ris ji ltar grub par 'gyur/ /myur du ras ris 'grub par gsungs/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub

sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ yi ge gcig pa 'khor los sgyur ba 'byung ba'i le'u rab 'byam las bcu dgu pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la

gzigs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyon cig /mdor na yi ge gcig pa 'khor los sgyur ba rdzu 'phrul chen po'i ras ris kyi cho gar 'gyur ba rgya che ba ni sngar bstan to/ /de ni dus kyi tha ma'i dus su sems can rnams brtson

'grus chung bar 'gyur zhing / shes rab chung ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dman pa'i phyir ras ris kyi tshad rgya che ba'i sbyor ba sgrub pa nyams par 'gyur bas/ sems can rnams la phan par 'dod pas zlos pa pos ji ltar dngos grub mchog thob par 'gyur ba de ltar ngas mdor bshad par

bya ste/ sgrub pa mchog byed par 'dod pas ras ma nyams pa kha tshar ma bcad pa skra dang bral ba dag la tshon ma 'dres pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ chos kyi rgyal po chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba 'jig rten thams cad kyi bdag po skyes bu dam pa rkang gnyis

rnams kyi mchog /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog ces bya ba rgyal ba'i mchog chos 'chad pa kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'o/ /'og tu ni tshangs pa dang 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje/ steng du ni phreng ba 'dzin pa'i lha'i bu gnyis 'og tu sgrub pa po

de'i mdun du dus gsum du a ga ru sreg cing 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas las su bya ba ni dang po 'khor lo'i sgrub pa byed par 'dod na/ lcags bzang po'i rang bzhin las rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo byas te/ cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed la bcom ldan

'das kyi spyan sngar dus gsum du a ga ru'i dud pas bdug cing 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa bya'o/ /tha mar zla ba nya ba la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas lag pas bzung ste/ ji srid rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de bzung na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar

'gyur ro/ /gang gis mthong ba de dang lhan cig nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gdugs bsgrub par 'dod na/ gdugs kha dog sna tshogs pa sar pa byas la gser gyi 'khor los mtshan pa ka shi ka'i gos 'phyang ba/ de nyid kyi cho gas mgo la

gdugs bzung bar byas te/ bzlas pa byas na rig pa rang nyid nye bar bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /'di nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dus gsum du a ga ru'i dud pas bdugs te/ 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa byas la/ tha mar zla ba nya ba la mchod pa rgya chen

po byas nas lag pas bzung ste/ ji srid du rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de thogs na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba re re zhing zla ba nya ba dang cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed lnga'i bar gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'di grub pa

tsam gyis chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon par dgyes pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rjes su bsngags pa

'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gi 'khor los sgyur ba stong gi g.yog 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba bsgrub par 'dod na/ gser dang / dngul dang / zangs ma dang / nor bu'i

rang bzhin gyi dbyug pa khru gang tsam byas la ji srid rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa byas nas de blang na nam mkha' la 'gro ste/ thams cad la chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste bum pa bzang po bsgrub par 'dod na/ gser gyi bum

pa bzang po byas la 'bru thams cad dang rin po che dang sman gyis yongs su bkang la/ ras dkar pos bcings te de la sngags 'dis bsgrub par bya ste/ cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed gcig la brtsams na gnyis pa la 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de la lag pa rab tu bcug na ci 'dod

pa de thob cing mi zad par yang 'gyur ro/ /ji ste nor bu rin po che bsgrub par 'dod na gser gyi dbyug pa'am/ nor bu bzang po dang shel gyi nor bu byas te/ gos 'phyang bar byas la cho ga 'di nyid kyis bsgrubs na gang bsams pa de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i

nang du thogs pa med cing stobs dang pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste bcom ldan 'das la bzlas pa bye ba byas na rang gi lus kyis nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i lus thob cing bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan gang yang gtsug tor gyi

rgyal po gdugs dkar po la sogs pa de yang 'dis bcom ldan 'das la 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na las rnams byed par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar thogs pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gzhan gyi rtog pa'i cho gas ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar ring po mi

thogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'bum phrag bcu bzlas na/ thams cad la 'grub par 'gyur ba rig pa dang sngags thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste rdo rje bsgrub par 'dod na tsan+dan dmar

po la rdo rje rtse gcig pa'am yang na lcags bzang po las byas te/ ba'i rnam lngas bkrus la yar gyi ngo'i lnga la ras ris kyi mdun du mchod pa chen po bya zhing mar gyi mar me brgya sbar la dri'i chus rdo rje bkrus te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag

nyid phul nas/ gtsug tor gyi rgyal po'i 'khor ram gzi brjid phung po'am/ gtsug tor gdugs dkar po'i sngags 'dis bsrung ba byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du grogs la yang bsrung ba byas nas rdo rje lag pa g.yas pas blangs te/ thun dang po 'das shing thun

gnyis pa la nye bar 'dug ste/ sems rtse gcig pas ji srid rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ /skabs 'dir rig pa 'dzin pa lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin thams cad 'dus te/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag rig pa

'dzin pa'i bstod pa byed cing khyim du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /lus phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra zhing phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar mgyogs pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ro/ /skad cig gis 'og min gyi lha'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /

bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa byams pa mthong zhing chos nyan par 'gyur ro/ /shi nas gang du 'dod pa der skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs drung du yang skye bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste ral gri bsgrub par 'dod na skyon med

pa'i ral gri blangs nas nyin zhag gcig smyung bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas ji srid du rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de grub na g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /skra rna cha gdub kor dang 'dra bar

'khyil ba dang / lo bcu drug pa'i cha byad can dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs med cing / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang bar gyi bskal par 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste ldong ros bsgrub par 'dod na dpa' bo'i tshong gis nyos te/ rgyal dang ldan pa'i dus su

zhag gsum smyung ba byas te/ dge slong bzang po'i dge 'dun la bshos drangs nas bka' lung stsal par bskul lo/ /sgrub pa po la der rjes su gnang nas rang gi gnas su rab tu zhugs te/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas mar gyi mar me stong rab tu sbar

nas zhag gsum smyung ba byas la/ sems can thams cad la byams pa bskyed nas bdag nyid phul te ldong ros blangs nas/ ji srid grub pa rnam gsum thob pa de srid du bzlas pa byas te/ dro ba dang du ba 'thul ba dang 'bar bas sngar gang bsams pa nyid du grub par 'gyur

te/ dro bar gyur pas dpral bar thig le byas na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / sha za la sogs pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i sems can bran du 'gyur zhing gang cung zad thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro/ /lo stong

gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /du ba 'thul ba la ni dpral bar thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur te/ gal te 'dod na lha rnams kyis kyang mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /skad cig thang cig yud tsam la snang zhing yang mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mi snang ba thams cad kyi rgyal

por 'gyur zhing lo sum stong gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /'bar bas ni rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ lha gzhon nu'i lus su 'gyur zhing lha thams cad

kyis kyang mi thul bar 'gyur na/ rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ bskal par yang gnas par 'gyur ro/ /dus byas nas dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste mdung rtse gsum bsgrub par 'dod na lcags bzang po las byas

pa'i mdung rtse gsum pa byas te/ lo'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas bye ma'i rang bzhin gyi mchod rten khru gang tsam gyi tshad byas te/ /de la mchod pa chen po bya zhing gtor ma rgya chen po btang la lag pa g.yas pas mdung rtse gsum pa blangs la skyil mo krung bcas nas ji

srid du spros pa na/ 'od zer stong byung ba de'i bar du bzlas pa byas na skabs 'dir dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad me tog gi char 'bebs pa dang lha thams cad kyang me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur

ro/ /de nas de thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas/ gang dag gis mthong ba dang gang mthong ba de dang lhan cig tu nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po mig gsum par 'gyur te/ dbang phyug chen po gnyis pa dang 'dra ba'o/ /rig

pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis phyag byas shing / bskal pa chen por gnas par 'gyur la/ bltas pa tsam gyis gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang gis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur na/ rig pa 'dzin pa

rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ shi 'phos nas bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste ro langs bsgrub par 'dod na/ yan lag rma med pa'i skyes bu'i ro blangs te/ seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhes btab la brang gi steng du rin po che'i phye mas gtor cing mchod na/ de'i

lce'i rtse mo la nor bu rin po che snang bar 'gyur te/ de blangs na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshon gang dag yid la bsams pa tsam gyis de dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'od dpag tshad brgya tsam du snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'dod na dus byed par

yang 'gyur ro/ /gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu yang rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar yang 'gyur ro/ /shi 'phos nas kyang dri ma med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /ro langs gnyis pa

sgrub pa ni rma med pa'i lus kyi ro blangs la/ rgya shug gi shing gi phur bus btab la de'i khar lcags kyi phye mas gtor zhing byin na/ de'i lce 'byin par 'gyur te/ de bcad na g.yog 'khor brgya dang bcas te nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ bar gyi bskal par gnas par

'gyur/ ri rab kyi rtse mor rtse zhing dga' bar 'gyur/ gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe phyogs gcig gi rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /ji ste lcags kyu bsgrub par 'dod na/ rtswa ku sha'i rang bzhin gyi lcags kyu bya ste/ thab mo ba mdog nag po'i lag pa'i mthil gyis

ba'i rnam lngas bkrus te/ mtshan mo gcig smyung ba byas nas lcags kyu khru gang gi tshad du byas la/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas phyag na rdo rje la mar gyi mar me brgya sbar bar bya'o/ /rdo rje lcags kyu dang bdag nyid la gdugs dkar pos bsrung bar bya'o/ /gzi

brjid phung pos ni dkyil 'khor bcing bar bya'o/ /phur bu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas te/ phyogs bzhir gtor la phur bus btab na 'og tu bcing ba byas shing gnas yongs su gzung ba byas par yang 'gyur ro/ /de nas thun gnyis pa la rtse gcig

pa'i yid kyis skyil mo krung bcas la/ lcags kyu la me tog dang dri dang bdug pas mchod na de bsrung ba byas pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas/ skabs 'dir lcags kyu lag pas bzung nas ji srid du dmyal

ba'i sems can rnams 'tshe ba nye bar zhi ba'i bar du bzlas la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po 'gro ba la thogs pa med pa lcags kyu lag na thogs pa lha thams cad

dang klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa yang thag ring po nyid nas mthong na phyag 'tshal bar byed do/ /bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe phyag na rdo rje'i gnas su 'gro zhing phyag na rdo rje mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te ras ris sgrub par gyur na/

de 'bar ba na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ cho ga gang bsgrub par 'dod kyang de'i sngags kyi ming bzung la 'bum bzla zhing / de nas nub gcig smyung ba byas te/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas la/ shing arka'i me rab tu sbar te til dag la zho dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong

rtsa brgyad byas na/ sbyin sreg gi mthar 'ongs nas nor gang 'dod pa de ster bar 'gyur zhing mngag gzhug pa dbang du byed pa bzhin du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /ji ste dbang phyug chen po dbang du byed par 'dod na/ dbang phyug chen po la mchod pa rgya chen po byas la/ lho

phyogs su yud tsam gyis shing arka'i me rab tu sbar la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas pa na/ ha ha zhes pa'i sgra byung bar gyur na 'jigs par mi bya/ de nas de 'ong bar 'gyur te/ bdag gis ci zhig bya zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug chen po'i rig pa

thams cad bdag la grub par gyur cig ces smras pa dang / mchog gang 'dod pa de ster bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin du gyur cig ces byas nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du khyab 'jug dang tshangs pa la sogs pa gang yang 'gugs par 'gyur te/ mchog

gang 'dod pa de'ang 'di bzhin te/ cho ga 'di bzhin du byas la legs par bsrung ba yang bya'o/ /ci ste gnod sbyin mo dgug par 'dod na/ de'i ming bzung la zhag bdun du shing mya ngan med kyi me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na 'ong zhing mchog ster bar byed do/ /zhag

bdun gyis ma dang sring mo dang chung ma gang 'dod pa de'i cha byad du nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste mi 'ong na mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /klu mo dbang du byed par 'dod na klu shing gi me tog gis cho ga 'di bzhin du bya'o/ /srin mo dgug par 'dod na/ zla

ba gsum du zho dang 'bras chan gyi sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sbyin sreg gi mthar zhag gcig smyung ba byas la/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing gnod sbyin la gtor ma chan rnams sbyin par byas shing gnod sbyin dgug par bya'o zhes yid la byed cing / /a mra'i shing gi yam

shing zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/ skabs 'dir lus ngan po la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin 'ong bar 'gyur la/ de dag la shing arka'i me tog gi mchod yon byin na de dag ci zhig bya zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/ /des brjod par bya ba ni

nyin re zhing gnod sbyin lung bzhin du byed pa dgos so zhes brjod par bya ste/ des gnod sbyin re re ster bar 'gyur ro/ /des lung bsgo bar bya ba ni dpag tshad brgya nas bud med rnams 'dir 'ong bar gyis la tho rangs de nyid du khyer cig ces pa dang 'khor brgya

la yang 'bras chan byin cig ces brjod na/ rgyab tu khur nas gang du 'dod pa der 'gro zhing khyer bar 'gyur ro/ /lung stsal ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste phyag na rdo rje bsgrub par 'dod na bzhi 'gyur dang bdun 'gyur gyi sngon du bsnyen pa byas la/ cho 'phrul gyi

zla ba phyed po ma lus pa la rab tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa byas la ji srid zla ba nya ba'i bar du ste/ zla ba nya ba'i bar du mchod pa byas la dge slong gi dge 'dun khyad par can dag la bshos gsol nas/ 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin kho na la rjes su yi rang bar byed du gzhug go/ /de

nas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas dang po'i thun 'das te gnyis pa'i thun la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la/ sems rtse gcig pas rdo rje 'dzin blta bar bya'o/ /zhes sems la kun tu brtags te/ gu gul gyi ril bu rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i tshad tsam gyi mtshan mo thun gcig

tu sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yul bskyod par 'gyur zhing / sa 'gul ba dang sprin gyi sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /skabs 'dir bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rig pa

thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba dang rig pa mchog la sogs pa'i rig pa'i rgyal pos yongs su bskor ba byon par 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad dang / klu thams cad dang / gnod sbyin thams cad dang / dri za dang mi'am cis byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bskor ba

byon par 'gyur ro/ /de'i mod la dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi shin tu drag pa'i tshor ba'i sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /dri'i chus mchod yon dbul zhing phyag 'tshal te 'dug par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs pa ni mchog ci zhig sbyin par bya/

rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dam sa 'og tu 'gro ba'am rgyal srid dam mi snang bar 'gro ba'am gang 'dod pa de nyid bcom ldan 'das las thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang 'dod pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dang rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi 'khor

los sgyur ba rdo rje'i sku dang / phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra ba dang bsams pa tsam gyis mtshan ma thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa chen por gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe 'dzin pa de'i tshe rdo rje'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rig pa 'dzin pa gzhan dag gi

yang cho ga 'di bzhin te/ mdor na phyag na rdo rje'i cho ga gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi cho ga gang yin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i cho ga gang yin pa dang / tshangs pa'i cho ga gang yin pa dang / dbang phyug chen

po'i cho ga gang yin pa dang / mdor na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa gang yin pa de dag kyang 'di nyid kyis sgrub pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sngags gang gis sgrub pa byas kyang ma grub pa ni 'dis lus la bzlas pa byas na/ nub bdun gyis nges

par mthong ba sbyin par byed do/ /ji ste mi sbyin na ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i mdun du gal te zlos pa byed na nub bdun gyi nang du mthong ba sbyin par byed do/ /gal te sbyin par mi byed na mgo tshal pa bdun phrag gsum du

'gas par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba dang nyi ma gzas zin pa na mar dang shu dag dang mig sman dang dag byed dang so shing dang mchod phyir thogs dang ba bla dang ldong ros la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o/ /ji ste rdzas rnams bsgrub par 'dod na/ ldong ros blangs te mi'i 'o ma dang sbyar

ba byas la ril bu lngar bya zhing / a ga ru'i snod kha sbyar gyi nang du bcug cing yungs kar dang lhan cig bsgrub par bya'o/ /zla ba dang nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su gtor ma'i cho ga byas te/ gang gi tshe yungs kar tsi ti tsi ti zhes sgra 'don pa de'i tshe grub pa dang po yin te/

skye bo thams cad dbang du 'gyur la de'i tshe 'di thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur te/ gang smras pa de thams cad byed do/ /ji ste du ba 'thul bar byed na mi snang bar byed pa thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /bar gyi bskal par 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /

gang gi tshe 'bar bar gyur pa de'i tshe ni lha gzhon nu'i gzugs su 'gyur zhing / nyi ma 'char ka'i gzi brjid dang ldan la rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du gi wang dang ba bla la sogs pa la'ang bsgrub par bya'o/ /

ci ste mig sman bsgrub par 'dod na/ lig bu mig dang ut+pa la sngon po dang ru rta dang tsan+dan dag gcig tu byas te/ zangs ma'i snod du gzhag la zla ba gzas zin pa'i dus su ci srid du ba 'thul ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas mig la bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur

te/ ci ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs dang mi snang bar byed pa thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /ji ste ral gri bsgrub par 'dod na ral gri ma nyams pa blangs la/ mar ngo'i tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi la ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po dang gtor ma btang zhing bsrung ba byas na/

ral gri lag pa g.yas pas bzung ste/ ji srid 'od 'phro ba dang 'bar ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na/ gal te 'od 'phro na ni rig pa 'dzin pa gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /'bar bas ni de rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ba dang / stobs dang pha rol gnon

pa thogs pa med pa dang gang gis mthong ba dang gang mthong ba de dang lhan cig nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste rdo rje bsgrub par 'dod na lcags bzang po'i rang bzhin las rdo rje byas te/ sor bcu drug pa rtse mo gnyi ga yang rtse gsum pa tsan+dan dmar pos byugs

la/ cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed kyi tshes nas brtsams nas ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te bzlas pa bya zhing / tshes nas nyi ma re re zhing re res bskyed pa'i dge slong dag la bshos drang bar bya'o/ /tha mar nub gsum smyung ba byas la sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du

ras ris rab tu bzhag cing / mchod pa rgya chen po byas la/ mar gyi mar me brgya rab tu sbar zhing ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug par bya'o/ /lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje bzung la ji srid 'bar ba de'i bar du bzlas pa bya zhing / de bzung na de 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro

bar 'gyur/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar pha rol gnon par 'gyur/ bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur/ lus zhig nas phyag na rdo rje'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mdung rtse dang 'khor lo dang mda' dang mdung la

sogs pa mtshon thams cad dang mchil lham dang so shing dang mchod phyir thogs la sogs pa gzhan gyi cho ga'i bya bas bsgrub par bya zhing / thams cad kyang grub pa rnam pa gsum yin no/ /zhi ba byed par 'dod pa la pad+ma'i rnam pa 'dra ba'i thab khung byas la/ mchod sbyin la 'os

pa'i yan lag gis me rab tu sbar la blugs gzar gyis zas mchog dang zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad zhag gsum byas na/ bdag dang gzhan zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun gyis ni grong ngam grong khyer gyi 'chi ba mang po'i nye bar 'tshe ba zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /

shing sha ma'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad kyang bya'o/ /yang na shing u dum bA ra'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad kyang bya'o/ /char mi 'bab pa la ni mngar gsum gyi sbyin sreg

byas na thams cad du mchog tu zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /slong mo'i zas za zhing cho 'phrul chen po'i zla phyed kyi zla ba nya'i bar du nub gsum smyung ba byas la/ zla ba gzas zin pa na ba nag mo'i 'o ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te 'thungs na bcud kyis len gyi yon tan

dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rtswa dUr ba'i 'jag ma la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pas stong rtsa brgyad nub bcu'i bar du sbyin sreg byas na dus ma yin par 'chi ba rab tu zhi zhing tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal mtshan dang dung la sogs pa la mngon par bsngags na/ mthong ba

dang thos pas pha rol gyi sde dpung gis mi g.yo bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /bum pa sar pa 'bru thams cad dang spos chus bkang ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pas log 'dren gyis gtses shing zin pa bkrus te dbang bskur na dpal dang ldan

par 'gyur ro/ /'dis dbang bskur na sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur te/ dkyil 'khor gyi las dang gdon gyi las rnams kyang byed par 'gyur ro/ /rma bya'i mjug ma la lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na dug thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/ /de nyid kyis rims

dang mig gi nad dang gzer thabs la sogs pa sel bar byed do/ /srung ba'i skud pas ni nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags kyis seng ldeng gi yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa

brgyad byas na lha ma yin gyi sngags 'joms par byed do/ /dus gsum du nyin mtshan nyi shu rtsa gcig la 'bras thug po che la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na longs spyod thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha dbang du bya bar 'dod na a ga ru'i yam shing

la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg dus gsum du nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig la stong rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /'bras thug po che la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa gcig tu byas pas sbyin sreg byas na zas mi zad par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dbang du byed na gu

gul gyi ril bu la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /shing mya ngan med kyi yam shing gi ni gnod sbyin mo rnams la bya'o/ /klu rnams la ni klu shing gi me tog gis bya'o/ /'phags pa phyag na rdo rje la ni a ka ru'i yam shing gis bya'o/ /

rig pa 'dzin pa la ni po son cha'i shing gi yam shing gis so/ /a ga ru'i yam shing la tu ru ska'i 'bru mar gyis btags pas ni dri za la sbyin sreg bya'o/ /rnams la ni bil ba'i shing gi yam shing gis so/ /mi'am ci rnams la ni sra rtsi pog gi sbyin sreg gis so/ /

log 'dren thams cad la ni zhag bdun du sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /rgyal po'i bu la ni yungs kar til mar gyis btags pa dus gsum du zhag bdun la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya zhing / nyi ma la mngon du phyogs nas bzlas brjod 'bum byas na sdig pa thams cad

las rab tu grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rig pa thams cad tshim par byed par 'dod na ba gcin dang nas kyi kha zas za zhing rtswa u shi ra las gzugs brnyan byas te/ me tog dkar pos mchod cing 'o ma brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg byas nas 'o mas khrus byas te/ bzlas

pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing a ga ru'i dud pas bdugs na tshim zhing rgyas par byas par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig bzlas pas bdag bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /lan gnyis bzlas pas gzhan bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /lan gsum bzlas pa byas pas

rdzas bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /lus chad pa dang zhom pa dang dug gis reg pa dang phur bus btab pa rnams la rtas par byed par 'dod na sman u shi ra las gzugs brnyan du byas te/ me tog dkar pos mchod la 'dis gtsug tor gyi rgyal po'i ras ris kyi mdun du

yungs kar gyi rgyal po la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na rig pa nye bar dmigs nas phur bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ji srid du bzlas kyang rig pa 'bras bu med par shes na gi wang gis gro ga la bris te/ gro ga de la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par

bsngags pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po byas la/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dang lhan cig stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ ku sha'i stan de nyid du gnyid log na rmi lam du 'ongs te 'bras bu med pa'i rgyu ston par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste me tog pad+ma bsgrub par 'dod na/

tsan+dan dmar po las pad+ma byas te/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas zhag gsum smyung ba byas te/ pad+ma lag pa g.yas pas bzung la ji srid 'bar ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na/ g.yog 'khor nyi shu dang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur

bar 'gyur/ thogs pa med par 'gro bar 'gyur/ gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste rdo rje bsgrub par 'dod na/ grog mkhar gyi sa dang bye ma bsres nas rdo rje byas la/ bslangs pa'i kha zas kyis 'tsho zhing mi smra ba'i

dka' thub dang lam 'gog par byed cing rdo rje bzung ste/ myur du bzlas pa 'bum bya'o/ /rdo rje ni rtse gcig par byas te/ rdo rje de yungs kar gyi nang du gzhag la/ yungs kar de ji srid du tsi ti tsi ti'i sgra sgrogs pa de srid du bzlas pa byas na rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje de

blangs nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur te/ ri'i rtse mo yang phye mar byed la klu'i shing yang skem par byed cing chu bo yang rgyun phyogs las zlog par byed do/ /klu rnams 'byer bar byed do/ /dug rnams dug med par byed do/ /srog chags thams cad rengs par byed do/ /

rmongs par byed do/ /ltung bar byed do/ /sngags phye mar byed do/ /shing rta la sogs pa yang rengs par byed do/ /de la sogs pa'i las thams cad byed par 'di nyid kyi rtse gsum pa'i rdo rjes sgrub par byed de/ gtsug spyod kyis kyang mngon sum du bgegs byed par mi

nus so/ /'di'i cho gas rtag tu bzlas pa byed pa'i dus su sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi sngags kyis thog ma dang tha mar lan re re bzlas pa byed na/ de dag zhi ba nyid du 'gyur zhing grub pa yang mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgya mtsho chen por 'bab pa'i chu bo la yi ge gcig pas

pad+ma 'bum dor na/ dpal rang 'ongs nas mchog dang rgyal srid kyang sbyin par byed de/ ci ste 'bru gcig pa dang bcas pa'i pad+ma 'bum phrag gsum dor nas kun la dbang ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /lnga 'bum bzlas na 'dzam bu'i gling gi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /sa 'og

tu 'jug pa'i sgor rkang pa bzhag ste/ 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na 'khrul 'khor thams cad bcom nas dogs pa med par 'gyur zhing / zhugs nas kyang bcud kyis len thams cad 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /ji ste de nyid du 'dug na'ang khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo'i 'jigs pa

med par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste 'khor lo nang du byung na yang sngags dran pa tsam gyis thal bar 'gyur ro/ /bsams pa tsam gyis phyir gso bar yang nus so/ /nam yang phyis rab tu 'jug par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /yar ngo de dang de'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te/ dus

gsum du sna ma'i me tog la lan gcig bzlas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthe bo'i drung du gzhag pa byas nas/ ci tsam na zhabs kyi mtho bo nas 'od zer byung nas/ sgrub pa po de'i lus la zhugs par 'gyur gyi bar du byas na/ de'i mod kho na la skra 'khyil zhing

'khor dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro/ /'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro zhing rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por yang 'gyur ro/ /bskal par yang gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgya mtsho'i ngogs su ras ris nub phyogs su bstan te bzhag la klu shing gis me rab tu sbar

nas/ rgya mtsho la dmigs nas klu shing gi me tog gis sbyin sreg 'bum byas na/ rgya mtsho'i rlabs 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ni grub pa'i mtshan ma yin pas 'jigs par mi bya'o/ /ji srid rgya mtsho las bram ze'i gzugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag gis

ci zhig bya zhes smra ba na khyod nga'i dbang du gyis shig ces smra bar bya'o/ /de nas gang ci bsgo ba de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /sa la pad+ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa bris te/ de'i steng du 'dug nas brgya phrag stong bzlas pa byas na pad+ma de sa las 'phags nas g.yog

'khor stong dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa chen por gnas pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por yang 'gyur ro/ /lam gcod par byed par yang mi nus so/ /'od dpag tshad lngar snang bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /cho 'phrul chen po'i zla ba

phyed la sna ma'i me tog dang ldan pas re re zhing bzlas shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor gyi steng du 'bum phrag gcig phul na/ ji srid gtsug tor nas 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sgrub pa po'i lus la zhugs kyi bar du byas na de'i mod kho na la mngon par shes pa

lnga thob par 'gyur ro/ /'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba ste de lta de ltar las byed par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid dang lhan cig gal te rig pa zlo bar byed na de nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /mngon sum du

bzlas na yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te 'ong bar mi byed na de'i mgo 'gas pa'am skem par 'gyur ro/ /yi ge gcig pa 'di ni gzhan ci zhig yin te/ gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa 'di nyid mngon sum yin te/ lha dang bcas pa'i

'jig rten na sngags dang rig pa thams cad kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa nyid do/ /gdugs dkar po dang gzi brjid phung po la sogs pa ni 'di'i g.yog 'khor yin te/ gtsug tor gyi rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang bsgrub par bya ba yin te/ cho ga thams cad

'di nyid la sbyar bar bya zhing / gtsug tor gyi rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang 'di bsgrub par bya'o/ /cho ga thams cad kyis kyang 'di bsgrub par bya'o/ /dngos grub dam pa 'dod pas kyang gnas ma yin par sbyar bar mi bya'o/ /gal te sbyor bar byed na grub pa dam par 'gyur

ba ma yin zhing / mdor na lha thams cad kyang 'dis 'gugs par byed do/ /de nas gter 'byin par 'dod na gang du gter yod pa der song la/ rtsa ba mi gnag pa'i bum pa blangs nas dri zhim po thams cad kyi lde gus byugs te/ tsan+dan dkar po dang chu'i nang du bcug ste/

stong rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas gal te gter yod na sa de rang bye bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te gter de mi gang tsam na yod na chus gtor la khru gang tsam brkos la blang bar bya'o/ /ci ste seng ge bsgrub par 'dod na grog mkhar gyi sa dang gi wang gi lde gus bsres pa'i gong

bu las byas nas bzhag ste/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas la ji srid 'gul ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur te 'gul ba na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rgyab tu zhon na rna cha gdub kor dang 'dra zhing 'khyil ba'i skra dang bdag dang bcas pa'i 'khor lnga bcu dang nam mkha' la

'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa ji lta bar lo stong phrag dgur 'tsho bar 'gyur/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du glang po che dang ma he bsgrub par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe seng ge seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa de'i tshe lha rnams stan las sa la ltung bar

'gyur ro/ /pad+ma'i mtshor phyin nas pad+ma 'bum gyis mchod na sa kun gyi rgyal thabs thob par 'gyur ro/ /shing ka ra bI ra'i tog kha ma 'bus pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na rgyal po'i bu mo thob par 'gyur ro/ /sna ma'i me tog 'bum gyis rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu bo la

sngags dang bcas pas gtor na/ gang 'dod pa'i bu mo thob par 'gyur zhing grub pa mchog thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba 'di'i sngags kyis ni de gang du 'ongs pa der dbang po yang de la stan stobs par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i rgyal po
