ni/ /rtag tu de ni rab gnas byed/ /mi khom rnams ni spong byed cing / /dal ba nyid kyang legs par thob/ /yi ge ka zhes rnam par bsgrags/ /'jig med dran dang ldan pa nyid/ /lo ni nyi shu gcig bar du/ /sa skyong rgyal srid byas par 'gyur/ /de nas gsud nad kyis

btab ste/ /dus byas nas ni lha gnas 'gro/ /blo ldan de ni mthar gyis su/ /myur du byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /de yi lhag ma'i rgyud las kyang / /gzhan la rab gnas 'tsho byed pa/ /de yi 'og tu sa skyong ba/ /sa srung 'tsho bas gnas pa yin/ /bram ze bkren pa'i

skye bo ni/ /the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de yi dus su chos min ldan/ /ston pa'i bstan pa nges par nyams/ /sngags kyi bstan pas sems can rnams/ /dge ba'i don du nges par sbyor/ /gang zhig gzhon nus bstan pa yi/ /sngags ni longs spyod 'phel byed pa/ /

rgyal po'i dbang phyug don du ni/ /de tshe de'i yul phyogs su yang / /grub pa mchog ni bsgrub bya min/ /chos kyi 'khor lo nyams dga' dang / /de bzhin 'od ma'i tshal chen dang / /gang du bcom ldan de zhi bar/ /phung po med par rab zhugs pa/ /sngags gnyis 'di dag bsgrub bya

ba/ /lha mo sgrol ma khro gnyer can/ /rtag tu rgya mtsho'i 'gram dang ni/ /snying po med pa'i 'bab chu mchog /gang gA'i 'gram ni thams cad du/ /pad+ma 'byung ba bsgrub par bya/ /sa bcu thob pa'i bdag po ni/ /gang yang byang chub sems de yang / /sems can rnams ni

'dul byed pa/ /zla ba zhes ni rnam par bsgrags/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo rdzu 'phrul che/ /de ni sgrol ma zhes kyang bstan/ /bud med gzugs 'chang lha mo ni/ /'gro ba kun tu rnam par rgyu/ /snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /sems can rnams la phan don du/ /mi mjed

'jig rten khams gnas nas/ /bud med ming gis 'jug par byed/ /sa bcu la ni rab gnas thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /sems can rnams ni 'dul byed pa/ /lha mo sgrol ma zhes su bstan/ /'di ni 'bad med grub pa ste/ /srung dang skyob dang

sbed par byed/ /longs spyod dbang phyug 'phel byed pas/ /'di ni lha mo bsgrub par bya/ /byang chub tshogs kyi ched du ni/ /skyed pa nyid nas brtsam par bya/ /snying rjes brlan pas lus can la/ /de tshe lha mo rjes 'brang ba/ /sngags kyi gzugs kyis sems can la/ /byang

chub tshogs ni bya phyir ro/ /re ba thams cad dga' rgyas phyir/ /shar gyi phyogs su gnas pa yin/ /bdag nyid rnam pa stong dang ni/ /rnam pa mang por byas nas kyang / /rgya mtsho bzhi yi mthar thug par/ /sa rnams kun tu rnam par rgyu/ /de nas shar gyi phyogs

su 'am/ /yang na bA rA Na sIr 'grub/ /lha mo de yi zhing du ni/ /shar gyi phyogs su rab tu bstan/ /'od chen po ni dzam b+ha la/ /gnod sbyin rgyal po yang dag 'grub/ /de tshe longs spyod ma lus 'dod/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /lha mo sgrol ma gnod sbyin rgyal/ /de nor

rgyas pa 'dod pas sgrub/ /de tshe khro bo'i sngags dag ni/ /lho phyogs dag tu bsgrub par bya/ /kla klo rkun ma'i gling dang ni/ /de bzhin rgya mtsho'i nang du ni/ /stobs chen sgrol ma gnod sbyin rgyal/ /de bzhin du yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /ha ri kel ka da raM tsa/ /kA ma rU pa gA dA

hA ya hi/ pho nya mo tshogs rnam mang dang / /gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen mo 'grub/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis gang gsung sngags/ /longs spyod kyi ni rgyur 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin yul der grub pa ste/ /gzhan yul de bzhin ma yin no/ /shar phyogs dang ni phyogs

mtshams su/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sngags kyi rgyur/ /de yi dus su bstan pa ni/ /lus can rnams kyis bsgrub par bya/ /dbus kyi yul du de bzhin sngags/ /de bzhin sa srung mang po ni/ /rgya che thams cad nyam chung ba'i/ /blo chung rnams kyis rtogs par byed/ /rgyal

po'i gtso bo mdor bsdus nas/ /ming ni 'di dag nges par brjod/ /dang po'i yi ge sha dang na/ /dang po'i yi ge par yang bstan/ /dang po'i yi ge ba dang e/ /dang po'i yi ge ar yang bstan/ /dang po'i yi ge har bstan te/ /dang po'i yi ge par yang bsgrags/ /dang po'i yi

ge dza dang ba/ /dang yig d+ha ni zla ba'i rigs/ /yi ge ha nyid rnam bsgrags dang / /de bzhin yang ni dang po'i a/ /dang po'i yi ge sa la yang / /bud med rigs min 'jig rten sdang / /dang po'i yi ge a dang ma/ /'jig rten rnams la mthu dang ldan/ /rim gyis rim gyis

rigs dag ni/ /bram ze rje'u rigs dag tu 'jug /phal cher chos min las byed cing / /rnam sdang bud med la brkam chags/ /sa srung skyon ni rab mang bar/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /yul gyi dbus su mi yi bdag /'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /dus kyi tha mar 'di dag

tshe/ /lo ni brgya dang nyi shu nyid/ /de yi tshe na mi rnams kyi/ /tshe ni ring bar rab tu bstan/ /de dag bar ma bzang po las/ /khyad par ring dang thung ba yin/ /rgyal po rnams ni tshe thung bar/ /de tshe dus su bstan pa ni/ /gang gA'i 'gram gyi ngogs dang ni/ /gangs can gyi ni ri zhol dang / /de tshe kA ma

rU yul du/ /de 'dra'i rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dang po bar ma tha ma yi/ /rigs kyi lhag ma brjod bya ste/ /dang po'i gtso bo chen po ni/ /rna can rgyal por rab tu bsgrags/ /tha ma ang ga'i bdag po dang / /der ni 'byor bzad 'byor pa dang / /legs byin srid pa byin pa ni/ /kA ma rU pa'i

yul du byung / /tha mar legs 'byor gzhon nu dang / /yi ge ba dang tha gnyis ni/ /yangs pa can du yang dag byung / /gang du thub pa de skyes pa/ /ser skya zhes bya'i grong mchog tu/ /tha mar zas gtsang shAg rigs kyi/ /nyi ma bu ram rigs skyes pa/ /tha mar zas gtsang rnam bsgrags pa/ /

shAkya shAkya'i rnam 'phel byed/ /sems can brtson 'grus chung bar ni/ /'jig rten skyes mchog bstan pa yin/ /gang zhig rgyal bas gsung sngags dang / /de bzhin bran po'i tshogs kun dang / /pho nya'i tshogs kun du ma dang / /rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag kyang / /rgyud rnams kun gyi don rig pas/ /

bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /'jig rten kun gyi sngags dag ni/ /yul gyi dbus der grub par 'gyur/ /dbus yul gnas par khyad par du/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa bsgrub par bya/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rtags dang ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rgyud dag dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs

sbyor bar ldan/ /lus can rnam pa sna tshogs 'grub/ /dbus kyi yul du de bzhin sngags/ /longs spyod 'phel ba bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin lus can bsrung don dang / /skyob dang dbang dang dgug pa 'grub/ /dbus kyi yul du mi yi bdag /'das dang ma 'ongs rab tu

gsungs/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rtags dang ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs tshe dang rigs/ /rgyal po thams cad gsungs pa ni/ /mchog dang tha ma bar ma yin/ /de bzhin rnam gsum grub pa ste/ /dus kyang gsum du sbyar bar bya/ /de bzhin sngags kyang rnam gsum du/ /de bzhin

thub pa mchog gis gsungs/ /rgyal po mtha' yas gsungs pa ni/ /dbus kyi yul dang nub phyogs dang / /byang phyogs dang ni shar phyogs dang / /de bzhin phyogs mtshams thams cad dang / /rnam pa bzhi ru mtshon pa yi/ /gling dag de bzhin kun tu yang / /sa bdag mtha' yas rab gsungs

pa/ /mtha' yas sngags ni sgrub pa dang / /mtha' yas yul la gnas pa dag /mtha' yas sngags ni yongs su 'grub/ /thub pa'i bstan pa nub pa na/ /tshar gcad rjes su gzung bar byed/ /dus su rgyal po dag la sngags/ /'jam dpal gyis ni gsungs pa yin/ /rdzu 'phrul rtse dang

rnam 'phrul dang / /'dir ni dus kyi spyod pa'ang bstan/ /sngags kyi bdag nyid sems can gyi/ /'gro ba skye gnas rgyal po'i ming / /sngags ni sgrub par 'dod rnams la/ /yul dang dus ni yang dag bstan/ /bstan pa nub pa'i 'og tu ni/ /zhar la rgyal po rnams kyis bstan/ /yon

tan bdag nyid che sngags rnams/ /tha mar 'bras bu rtogs par byas/ /rgyal po gzhan ni theg pa dang / /sngon ni 'gal ba med par bstan/ /dus kyi tha ma de dus su/ /rab tu gnas par the tshom med/ /de dag phyogs la gnas par ni/ /rgyal po thams cad gsungs pa yin/ /de bzhin

shAkya'i gsung rab la/ /nges par rab byung gnas nas ni/ /'jig rten mig gcig gyur pa yi/ /thub pa mchog ni med pa na/ /rtag tu sngags smra la dad pas/ /bstan pa'i don ni byed par 'gyur/ /de dag gzhon nu bshad par bya/ /rtse gcig yid kyis mnyan par gyis/ /ston pa'i gsung

rab sa steng du/ /dus mthar 'jig rten nyams pa na/ /sdom brtson rgyal po'i tshul gyis ni/ /'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /dper na ma khol zhes bya dang / /me tog ces byar rnam par grags/ /yi ge ma zhes gzhon nu zhes/ /dang por tha mar chos la dga'/ /klus bos zhes bya rnam par

grags/ /rin chen 'byung zhes bya ming dang / /yi ge ga zhes gzhon nu zhes/ /yi ge ba zhes chos sems byed/ /yi ge a ming bdag nyid che/ /ston pa'i bstan pa gces 'dzin byed/ /blo ldan yon tan kun gyis bkur/ /dang po'i yi ge la zhes bstan/ /rgyal po sangs rgyas pa yi phyogs/ /ston

pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed/ /sdom brtson yi ge a zhes bsgrags/ /bram ze las ni rab tu byung / /grong khyer gnas bcas gnas pa ste/ /de bzhin tshe ni brgyad cur 'tsho/ /dang yig yi ge a dge slong / /lho yi phyogs su 'byung bar 'gyur/ /blo ldan tshe ni drug cur 'tsho/ /ka shi zhes bya'i

grong du gnas/ /yi ge d+ha zhes sdom brtson nyid/ /lho yi phyogs su rnam par bsgrags/ /pha rol rgol ba bzlog nas kyang / /de bzhin sdom brtson sngags kyang grub/ /gzhan yang rab byung dam pa ni/ /sing ga la yi grong na gnas/ /'phags pa min la 'phags pa'i ming / /sing ga

la yi gling na gnas/ /pha rol rgol ba bzlog nas ni/ /mu stegs rnams kyi sngags sun phyung / /de dus 'jigs su rung ba yi/ /dus kyi mtha' las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /yi ge da dang la dang por/ /sdom brtson gang zhig rab gsungs dang / /yi ge ra dang ba dang por/ /dge slong

gang zhig rab byung gsungs/ /ston pa'i bstan pa gsal byed pa/ /'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /rgyal po nag po zhes bya bar/ /yi ge sa zhes sdom brtson 'byung / /mchod rten kun dga' ra ba gnas/ /rdzing dang khron pa'ang thams cad du/ /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan de

bzhin rtags/ /gzings dang zam pa nyid rnams ni/ /byed par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /mtshon gyis lus zhig mtho ris 'gro/ /de nas yi ge sa dang ka/ /dang po dag tu brjod pa dang / /de bzhin yi ge ra dang g+ha/ /dang po dag tu rab brjod dang / /dang por yi ge ba dang ni/ /

legs byin legs de sde zhes bstan/ /sbyin byed sbyin par byed pa nyid/ /gzhan gyi grub mtha' sun byed pa/ /tshong pa sngon dang sman pa sngon/ /gnyi ga sbyin byed sna tshogs byed/ /yi ge ba zhes sdom brtson bsgrags/ /de las gzhan pa dang yi ger/ /dang por yi ge ba

grags dang / /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan don yang byed/ /blo ldan dang por yi ge ma/ /de bzhin sdom brtson dad pa 'byung / /rnam pa du ma sdom brtson gsungs/ /de tshe mtha' yas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sdom brtson thams cad bsgrags pa yang / /ston pa'i

bstan pa gsal byed pa'o/ /bstan pa de tshe sa steng du/ /rnam par nyams shing snang med la/ /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan yid du 'ong / /byed par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /thams cad byang chub lung bstan te/ /nga yi byang chub mchog thob 'gyur/ /de bzhin 'jig rten sbyin

gnas 'gyur/ /srid pa gsum gyi mthar yang byed/ /sngags dang rgyud la mngon brtson pas/ /grags pa 'dzin par shes par bya/ /bram ze chos kyi ngang tshul can/ /de ni rab tu brjod par bya/ /sngags dang rgyud la mngon brtson pas/ /rgyal po'i lugs la nye bar

gnas/ /de tshe mi bzad dus dag tu/ /'jig rten kun la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /yi ge ba zhes bram ze mchog /phyug cing rig byed pha rol phyin/ /de 'dir sa rnams ma lus par/ /rtsod pa'i phyir ni rab tu rgyu/ /mtsho gsum sa yi mthar thug par/ /pha rol mu stegs

rtsod la dga'/ /gang phyir dang po gtso bo'i tshig /sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /gzhon nus yongs su gsungs gyur pa/ /yi ge drug pa'i sngags kyang zlos/ /cho ga rab 'byam 'di dag las/ /des ni de phan de la bsten/ /rgyal dang legs par rgyal ba dang / /

grags ldan dge ba de las gzhan/ /rigs ldan chos dang ldan pa dang / /brtson ldan legs pa khyab 'jug dang / /sbrang rtsi sbrang rtsi bzang po dang / /de bzhin grub dang dregs bral dang / /ra g+ha ba dang dmangs rigs dang / /de bzhin ka shir skyes pa gzhan/ /gzhon nu

'di yi bzlas pa la/ /thams cad kun yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de dag kun kyang bzang po ste/ /blo ldan mang du thos pa yin/ /de kun sngags ni mngon du gyur/ /rgyal po'i 'tsho bas yang dag gnas/ /de 'og rnam par grags pa ni/ /bram ze dang po'i yi ge bi/ /

grong khyer me tog ces bya bar/ /de ni khro bo grub par gyur/ /dbul bas yongs su zil mnan pas/ /rgyal po rnams ni tshar bcad byas/ /khro rgyal gshin rje gshed de yi/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dir gsungs pa/ /sems can ma rungs rnams dang ni/ /gdul

dka' 'dul bar byed pa dang / /phan pa min las bzlog don dang / /phan pa nye bar 'phel phyir dang / /sems can rnams ni rjes gzung dang / /sems can srog 'chad dgag phyir ro/ /bram ze'i khye'u rmongs pa de/ /dbul ba khro ba chags pa yis/ /rgyal po'i srog la gnod

pa'i phyir/ /khro bo'i sngags ni zlos par byed/ /de 'og rnam par grags pa ni/ /bram ze yi ge dang po a/ /chos don dge ba ldan bdag nyid/ /bden par smra zhing dbang po thul/ /mnga' bdag mang pos bkur ces pa/ /de tshe sngags ni zlos par 'gyur/ /sngags

ni bsgrub par gyur pa la/ /dbang 'gyur yin gyis gzhan ma yin/ /'byung po dbang du gyur pa na/ /de tshe nor dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de 'og rnam par grags pa ni/ /bram ze chos don sems byed pa/ /de nas mthar ni dang yig sha/ /ma la'i yul du de ni 'byung / /sa steng

sngags ni zlos par grags/ /bstan pa mchog la'ang rab tu dad/ /rig pa rjes bzung ma rungs dang / /tshangs pa'i srin po srin po dang / /'byung po shin tu ma rungs bcas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sha za dang / /bstan dang 'gro ba sna tshogs ni/ /de dag ma lus de dbang

'gyur/ /de bzhin bram ze'i mtshan ldan pa/ /thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /de 'og rnam par grags pa ni/ /lho yi phyogs su bram ze ni/ /yi ge dang por ba bstan pa/ /ston pa'i bstan la de gtsor byed/ /mchod rten kun dga' ra ba gnas/ /ston pa'i gzugs

brnyan yid 'ong gis/ /sa ni rgya mtsho gnyis mthar thug /thams cad kyi ni rgyan du byas/ /de 'og rnam par grags pa ni/ /bram ze gtso bo nor chen ldan/ /dang po'i yi ge na zhes pa/ /lho yi phyogs su yang dag bstan/ /bdag nyid chen po sngags zlos ldan/ /nges par byang

chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /dbus kyi yul du bstan pa ni/ /bram ze gang ba bzang zhes pa/ /'dul ba dang ni tshul bzang nyid/ /gang ba bcom brlag dag tu gnas/ /dang yig b+ha ni nor gyi spyan/ /rgyal po rnams ni sngags mchod byed/ /bram ze 'di dag

bstan pa ni/ /ston pa'i bstan pa mchod byed pa'o/ /thog ma bar mthar gtso bo ste/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gnas dang rigs/ /sna tshogs phyogs kyi bram ze rnams/ /bram ze gzhan gyis mchod par byed/ /mu stegs sna tshogs rigs dang ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs spyod

yul spyod/ /gnas ni kun tu gsungs pa ste/ /bram ze'i khye'u mang thos yin/ /rang byung sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal/ /sems can kun gyi don sgrub pa/ /sems can rnams ni ma lus dang / /lha gnas kyis kyang mchod pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po yang / /'jig

rten kun la grags pa ste/ /'phags skyes po dang mig mi bzang / /yul 'khor srung dang gnod sbyin rgyal/ /brgya byin de nas lha rnams kyi/ /nges pa'i tshig ni rab tu bsgrags/ /'thab bral lha yi bu dang ni/ /'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / /rgyal po dga'

ldan gsungs pa dang / /'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug mchog /gcig gi ming ni brgya byin sogs/ /de bzhin 'dod khams dbang phyug yin/ /de yang rtag tu gcig gnas te/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po gcig gi gzugs/ /de yang mtha' yas dag tu bstan/ /rnam

pa sna tshogs gzugs 'chang lha/ /de las gong du thams cad mnyam/ /de yang thams cad rdzu 'phrul che/ /lha yi gtso bo ming gcig ste/ /'du shes med pa'i mthar yang bstan/ /de dag gtso bo med pa ste/ /mnyam pa'i tshul du yang dag gnas/ /'og tu mnar med

mthar thug par/ /der ni rgyal po yod ma yin/ /'jam dpal de bas na/ de ltar phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus su rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod 'di glegs bam du chud par byas te/ 'dri bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/

kha ton du byed par 'gyur ba'am glegs bam du byas te 'chang bar 'gyur/ /gus par byas te yid la byed par 'gyur/ /gos rnam pa sna tshogs dang / phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dril bu dang / rol mo dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang /

spos dang / dri dang / dri zhim po dag gis mchod par byed par 'gyur/ /ri mor byed par 'gyur/ yang dag par 'dzin par byed par 'gyur/ /yid rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis chos byed par 'gyur ba de la ni/ /phan yon bcu po 'di dag tu 'gyur te/ /bcu gang zhe na/ der 'di

la pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ /char 'bab pa mi mkhas pa dang gza' dang 'ching ba chen po'i 'tshe ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ /mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la mi'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ /phyir rgol ba thams cad

kyi 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la nad kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la dus ma yin pa'i char gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /char ches pa'i 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la rlung chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'jigs pa

'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sha za thams cad kyi 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du g.yon can rkun po'i 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gshin rje'i rgyal pos khyer ba'i 'jigs pa'am/

der 'di la chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za'i 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la gzhan gyi sngags kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyar ba'i dug thams cad kyi 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la nad kyi 'jigs pa dang /

rims dang / tshad par 'khru ba dang / ma zhu ba dang / yan lag dang / nying lag gi nad kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ phan yon bcu po 'di dag tu shes par bya'o/ /gang du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi cho ga chen po rab 'byam chos kyi mdzod 'di glegs bam du byas te/ bzhag

la 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / 'dzin pa dang kha ton du byed na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis shin tu bzung zhing chos kyi mdzod mngon du 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig gi spyod pa la rjes su ma zhugs pa dang dam tshig mi shes pa gzhan dag la ni rnam pa

thams cad du bstan par mi bya ste/ gang gi phyir 'di ni gsang ba yin pa'i phyir te/ 'dis ni thams cad mtshon pa yin na sems can rnams kyi dran pa med par ma byed cig /'on kyang khyod kyis shes par 'gyur mchod pa byed par 'gyur yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur zhing bsod

nams chen po yang rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can skal ba med pa rnams la bstan par mi bya ste/ gzhan du na dbul ba dang / nad dang / mdze dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'go ba'i nad nyid byed par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na gzhan dag la yang bstan par mi bya'o/ /dam tshig dang

gsang ba pa dang gsang ba'i sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su zhugs pa'i sems can rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la legs par bslab pa rnams dang legs par rnam par bzhag pa'i dran pa dang ldan pa rnams dang / chos kyi don la mkhas pa rnams dang bsam gtan la rab tu zhugs

pa dang chos la gnas pa dang bden par smra ba dang sems can gyi spyod pa la rab tu gnas shing snying rje'i spyod pa dang rab tu ldan pa rnams te/ sems can 'di dag la bstan par bya'i gzhan dag la ni ma yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las

langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci zhes bya/ /'di bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar

bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya bar yang zung shig /ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi man ngag legs par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig /byang chub

sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa rgyud thams cad kyi mdzod ces bya bar yang zung shig /theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa nges par bstan pa nyams pa med pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya bar yang zung shig /'phags pa 'jam dpal

gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhes bya bar yang zung shig /chos thams cad kyi don rdzogs pa nges par bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /'jig rten ma lus thams cad la/ /chos dang chos min rnam spyod cing / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /gang khyod kun tu rnam par rgyu/ /

de bzhin chos kyi dam pa mchog /gsang ba gzhan ni ma mthong ngo / /sngags rgyud don dang mdo rnams dang / /'gro ba yul ni skyon med dang / /byang chub chos la rab gzhol ba/ /dpa' bo gzhan ni ma mthong ngo / /gang 'di bla ma gsang ba dang / /drang don mdo yis yongs

su brgyan/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mdo don dang / /sngags dang rgyud kyi rjes 'jug pa/ /cho ga rab 'byam 'di las gzhan/ /ma byung gang yang yod ma yin/ /rgyal srid chen po longs spyod che/ /lha gnas dag tu'ang phun sum tshogs/ /de bzhin lha dang mi rnams kyi/ /grags

pa rgyas pa'ang thob par 'gyur/ /mi khom brgyad ni spong byed cing / /dal ba dag ni thob par byed/ /theg pa rnam gsum bdag po dang / /de nges sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ /mdo 'di 'dzin pa'i bsod nams dang / /de bzhin du ni phan yon 'di/ /'di yi lus la mtshon

mi 'byung / /dug dang mes kyang ma yin no/ /ro langs dang ni gdon dang ni/ /de bzhin srul po ma mo dang / /srin po sha zas 'tshe byed pa'ang / /gang zhig mdo 'di 'don la min/ /'chang ba dang ni klog pa dang / /yang dang yang du mchod byed dang / /'jigs pa med pas

mchod byed dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs mchod byed de/ /phan yon 'di ni rab bstan pa/ /'jig rten 'dir ni thob 'gyur ba/ /nad pa rnams ni nad las grol/ /sdug bsngal can ni bde bar 'gyur/ /dbul pos nor ni rnyed 'gyur te/ /bcings pa rnams ni 'ching

las grol/ /'gro ba lnga dang ldan pa yi/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ltung ba rnams/ /bde ba zhi ba mya ngan 'das/ /mi g.yo go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur/ /rang rgyal sangs rgyas nyid dang ni/ /nyan thos mthar ni phyin par 'gyur/ /mdo sde 'di ni bklag

pa yis/ /sangs rgyas sku mdog thob par 'gyur/ /gang gA'i bye ma mnyam pa yis/ /rgyal ba mchog ni mtha' yas pa/ /mchod pas thob pa'i bsod nams dang / /mdo 'di bton pa'i bsod nams mnyam/ /'jig rten ji snyed gang su dag /zhing ni bye ba mtha'

yas pa/ /de srid phra rab rdul snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas rnams la rtag mchod pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bza' btung dang / /na ba rnams kyi gso sman dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs gnas mal rnams/ /rtag tu thams cad rab sbyin dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs gos dang ni/ /phye ma dag

ni kun gyis kyang / /bsod nams skye bos thob gang yin/ /'di dag 'chang dang klog pas so/ /gang zhig rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /'jig rten nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/ /sa bcu la gnas de las gzhan/ /de rnams tshad ni de mnyam la/ /de dag

mchod pa'ang de bzhin te/ /gang gi lag par glegs bam chud/ /mi yis de mnyam bsod nams thob/ /'jig rten ji snyed bstan pa yang / /'jig rten khams na gnas pa yi/ /grangs med sems can ma lus pa/ /thams cad nad ni med byas te/ /skye bo

gang zhig yang dang yang / /bkur stir byas nas de mchod pa/ /chos mchog 'di la mchod na ni/ /blo ldan de yis bsod nams 'thob/ /bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par/ /rgyal ba mchog gis rtag par yang / /'jig rten mgon chos mdzad mchog

'di/ /mchod par yang ni mi nus so/ /chos mchog 'di ni sa steng du/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'dra/ /'jam pa'i cho ga 'dir gsungs pa/ /bklags pa dang ni 'chang ba yis/ /des ni 'dod 'jo'i ba 'drar 'gyur/ /longs spyod che nor phun

sum tshogs/ /yid ni skyo ba med byas nas/ /sa steng 'di ni rab tu sgrub/ /sngags dang rgyud don drang ba'i don/ /don yod tshig ni rab bshad pa/ /bya ba dus la brten nas ni/ /sa steng rig pa 'dzin bsgrub na/ /rin chen phun tshogs rab gang ba/ /de yi phyogs

kun dag tu gsungs/ /'bras bcas 'gro ba'i bdag nyid che/ /spyod pa bzang bar brjod pa yin/ /gang zhig cho ga mchog 'di las/ /rgyal po sngags gcig 'chang byed pa/ /rgyal srid phun sum tshogs don bcas/ /tshe ring phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ /rnam

pa sna tshogs longs spyod tshogs/ /rgyal mchog dam pas 'thob par 'gyur/ /'gro dang gnas pa'i dug dag dang / /gzhan gyis byas pa'i rig pa dang / /ro langs sngags kyis sgrub pa dang / /mtshon gyis kyang ni gnod mi 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi gnod byed gtsor

byed pas/ /sa steng 'jig rten gnod mi byed/ /chom rkun nad ni gzhan dag dang / /me yi 'jigs pa de la med/ /rgyal po skye bo dag kyang rung / /su zhig de la mchod mi byed/ /gang zhig mdo sde dkon mchog 'di/ /'chang dang klog pa'ang de bzhin no/ /rgyal po rgyal

rigs spyi bo nas/ /dbang bskur yul du nyer gnas tshe/ /mdo sde mgo la nges bcings nas/ /yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal na/ /de la rkun pos mi gnod cing / /mtshon gyis de la phog mi 'gyur/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs su yang dag byung / /rma bya'i gdan la

legs bkod pa/ /glang po'i mtshog ma'i steng bzhag nas/ /g.yul du yang dag zhugs byas na/ /skye bo rnams sdang de dag kun/ /mthong ba tsam gyis ldog par byed/ /byis pa'i gzugs can bzang po ni/ /gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis yongs su brgyan/ /gser

dang dngul dang ra gan gyis/ /rgyal mtshan yu ba bsgreng ba la/ /rgyal mtshan ba dan btags nas ni/ /legs dgad legs par mnyam par bzhag /g.yul du dgras ni legs gang ba/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs byed pa/ /thams cad g.yul du 'dus

pa la/ /de yi tshe na 'jug par bya/ /rgyal mtshan sgreng la gnas pa yi/ /gzhon nu las ni sna tshogs pa/ /rnam pa du ma'i gzugs dang ldan/ /bdag nyid chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /sa bcu'i bdag po'i bdag po ni/ /mthong ba tsam

gyis 'jigs par byed/ /rgyal rigs rgyal po chen po ni/ /'jig rten sa srung sa gnas pa/ /dad ldan yid gnyis the tshom ni/ /rnam bral chos la mnyes gshin pa/ /bde bar gshegs la dad bskyed nas/ /snying rjes brlan pa'i yid kyis ni/ /'dir bshad

'di dag bya ba ni/ /grub par 'dod pas rab tu bya/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba'i sngags dang ni/ /rgyud dang ldan pa sa steng du/ /chos dbyings tshogs pa'i rgyal ba yis/ /gsung rab 'di dag nges par bstan/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam gnas pa'i/ /rgyal

mchog snga ma grangs med pas/ /sa yi steng gi mi rnams la'ang / /chos kyi mdzod ni gsungs pa yin/ /lha dang lha min sngon g.yul 'thab/ /pha rol 'jigs pa byung ba na/ /gang tshe brgya byin sngon gyur pa/ /dpung ni pham byas zhe sdang bas/ /de tshe gcig tu song nas

ni/ /sa steng rnam par du bar gyur/ /rgyal mchog 'od srung de la ni/ /thub pa mchog la de tshe zhus/ /ji ltar bya zhes tshig tu ni/ /bde sogs bdag pos rnam par smras/ /mi bzad lha min gyis pham nas/ /bdag kyang 'dir ni yang dag lhags/ /de skad bcom

ldan gsol nas ni/ /lha yi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ /de tshe thub mchog zhabs gnyis la/ /spyi bo'i gtsug gis rab btud nas/ /mig stong kau shi ka ni/ /de yi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur/ /de skad gsol nas thub mchog ni/ /bram zer gyur pa 'od srung

gis/ /de tshe gsung du bka' stsal pa/ /ka la ping ka'i sgra skad du/ /rgyal ba mchog gis sngon gsungs pa/ /gzhon nu sna tshogs yang dag byung / /bdag nyid chen po 'jam dpal ni/ /rnyed dka' sku ni 'bum gyur pa/ /yang dag mtha' la gnas

nas ni/ /zab mo'i don gyi don ston byed/ /spros med rnam pa med pa dang / /gnas med pa las gzugs byas nas/ /shin tu don ldan chos kyang ston/ /lha yi dbang phyug de ni dran/ /de nas de ni de dran pas/ /byang chub sems dpa' dran tsam gyis/ /gzhon nu sna

tshogs gzugs can ni/ /der ni de yi mod la lhags/ /der ni bcom ldan 'das dang ni/ /bcom ldan lha yi dbang phyug bcas/ /lhags nas byang chub sems dpa' des/ /de tshe rgyal ba mchog la btud/ /rgyal ba mchog kun phyag 'tshal nas/ /'od chen 'od srung

la yang btud/ /de tshe thub pas rjes gnang nas/ /sngags kyi tshig ni 'di smras so/ /na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwe b+h+yaH/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa ne b+h+yaH/ o~M ha na ha na/ sarba b+ha yot+sA da ya trA sa ya/ mo Ta ya/ tshin+da/ b+hin+da/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sngags 'di smras ma thag tu sa chen po 'di ri dang rgya mtsho'i mthar thug pa dang bcas pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi zhing mtha' yas pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs kyi mthar

thug pa thams cad dang bcas pa yang rab tu 'gul bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis kyang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'jigs pa dang bral nas ba spu langs te ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba thob

nas/ mig gnyis phye ste/ stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud nas lan gsum bskor ba byas shing / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mngon du bltas nas sngags kyi tshig de dag bzung ste/ yid la byas nas phyir yang shing rta la zhon

te/ lha ma yin gang yin pa de logs su phyin par gyur to/ /de nas lha ma yin thams cad rgya mtsho chen po'i mtha'i 'gram du gang rang gi grong khyer gang yin pa der mngon du phyogs shing song bar gyur te/ sems zhum zhing nyams la dpung gi 'jigs pas

sems dkrugs shing gdong gi mdog nyams shing nga rgyal dang dregs pa la sogs pa dang bral bar gyur la/ /mtshon cha dang bral zhing ri 'bigs byed 'bar ba bzhin du lha'i dbang phyug de mthong nas byer bar gyur to/ /de nas lha yi dbang po brgya

byin gyis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig /ma 'jigs shig /sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha ma yin las bdag cag nges par rgyal bas rang gi gnas su 'gro bar bya'o/ /rang rang gi gnas ci lta ba

bzhin du song nas khyod cag rtse ba dang dga' ba yongs su spyod par gyis shig /de nas lha de dag thams cad yid shin tu dga' nas phyir yang rang gi gnas su log par gyur to/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/

gang bdag gis gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyi gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa de byas la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la'ang btags na/ des na gang gi lha ma yin gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /zhes bstan to/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis chen po la 'os

pa'i nor bu rin po che nang 'od dang ldan zhing gsal ba'i phreng ba blangs nas/ gzhon nu'i cha byad kyi gzugs brnyan byas te/ steng gi khang bzang du grong khyer chen po blta na sdug pa'i dbus na/ lha rnams kyi 'dun sa chos bzang gi rtse mor rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba

legs par bkod pa byas nas bzhag par gyur to/ /de nas lha ma yin de dag rab tshim byed dang / thags ris la sogs pa de dag lha rnams kyi steng du mi 'gro zhing / lha de dag kyang zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur la/ rdzu 'phrul

las rnam par 'phrul pa'am/ g.yul mngon du phyogs par 'gro bar mi nus so/ /de ltar lo bye ba khri phrag du ma mi ma yin pa'i grangs kyis bgrang bar yang lha ma yin gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du phan yon dpag tu

med pa bstan pa dang / tshe dang / nad med pa 'phel bar/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang sngon du gsungs pa yin no/ /de bzhin du phan yon gyi yon tan mchog 'di dag rgya

che ba dang / mtha' yas shing mu med pa sngon gsungs pa yin no/ /gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spangs sam/ rnam par rtog par byed na/ bsod nams ma yin pa dpag tu med pa 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / dmyal bar yang skye bar

'gyur la/ dud 'gro dang / dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi skye ba ngan par yang 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /sman dang / sngags rnams med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /de rnams kyi bdag nyid chen po rdzu 'phrul

che ba dang / rnam par 'phrul ba yang med do/ /cho ga rgya che ba yang med do/ /'phags pa ma yin pas bshad do/ /zhes byas nas spang ba'am/ /yang na 'gro zhing 'di nyan par mi nus so/ /zhes gnas de las gzhan du

'gro na/ de dag la bsod nams ma yin pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste blo chung ba gang gis chos 'di ni thub pa mchog dang / thub pa'i sras blo dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /zhes rab tu spong bar byed do/ /mi de dmyal bar 'gro 'gyur

zhing / /de nyams nas ni dud 'gror 'gro/ /thig nag dang ni yang sos dang / /spu gri so dang me ma mur/ /ro myags chu bo rab med skye/ /de nas phyir yang spu gri sor/ /lo ma ral gri lta bu'i nags/ /yang na kyi hud zer de bzhin/ /'jig rten grags

pa so thams thams/ /sdig pa'i las kyi dmyal ba ru/ /gang gis chos ni sun byed pa/ /de ni skye ba de dag 'gro/ /'jig rten smad par rab bstan pa/ /mi bzad mnar med pa zhes bya/ /ma dad sems kyis chos spangs pa/ /sdig pa'i las can gnas yin te/ /

gang zhig chos ni 'di 'jigs pa/ /de la skye bo de 'tshed 'gyur/ /kun gyi mthar thug mnar med pa/ /de nyams de bzhin dmyal chen skye/ /dmyal ba'i sa mtha' mtha' yas par/ /rtag tu blo med de ni 'gro/ /mdo sde de ni rgya cher bcas/ /

chos kyi nor kun rab spangs nas/ /de ni 'jig rten ngan par 'gro/ /dbang med rtag par dbang du 'gro/ /gang zhig mdo sde'i cho ga 'di/ /sngags dang rgyud kyis legs par brgyan/ /grub pa sna tshogs brgya rnams 'thob/ /yang dag mtha'

ni sgrib pa med/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi sku nyid yin/ /dmigs su med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /cho ga cho ga rgya chen bcas/ /le'u rab 'byam 'dis 'dren byed/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni legs dgod pa/ /phun tshogs dpal dang blo gros mchod/ /

rtsa ba'i cho ga mi nyung ba/ /rgya che mang por bstan pa yin/ /rtag dang chad dang thog mtha' ni/ /gnyi ga'i mtha' don rnam par spangs/ /rim bcas rim ni nges par bstan/ /sngags kyi lus ni btus pa yin/ /me dang rlung dang nam mkha' dang / /stong

pa'i de nyid legs gsungs pa/ /spangs pa rtag tu 'gro ba ni/ /'og nas 'og tu de tshe 'gro/ /bskal pa rnam mang gsum gyi grangs/ /de tshe bsod nams yongs bsags nas/ /de tshe byang chub thob nas ni/ /bdag dang rgyal ba mchog rnams

kyis/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi don gsungs pa/ /'gro ba yul ni sdig med la'o/ /rtsa ba'i cho ga dag byed dang / /sdig pa med cing bkra shis pa'i/ /le'u rab 'byam rab gsungs pa/ /nges pa'i mdo sde bzang po yin/ /sa bdag yon

tan bdag nyid che/ /yul dang dus kyi sbyor ba dang / /rgyal sras mi ru skyes pa yis/ /sa steng dam pa'i chos bstan ces/ /'jig rten gtso bo thub pa ni/ /rgyal ba bdun pas bstan pa yin/ /cho ga rgya cher gsungs pa ni/ /blo dang

dpal ni mngon par 'phel/ /rtsa ba rab 'byam le'u zhes/ /sngags dang rgyud dang ldan pa de/ /gang zhig mdo mchog gtso bo 'di/ /rgyal bas mchod pa'i chos kyi mdzod/ /sa steng mis ni spong byed pa/ /de ni mnar med dmyal bar 'gro/ /

bskal pa chen por de 'tshed ces/ /rnam pa du mar dbye bar bstan/ /nam zhig gang du 'byung ba ni/ /mi yi lus su skyes na yang / /dbul zhing nad mang glen pa dang / /kla klo dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten smad par 'gro ba ste/ /de ni

mdze can nad par 'gyur/ /lkugs shing 'on pa yan lag nyams/ /blo nyams long ba nyid dang ni/ /rtsub cing rtag tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /sa steng lta bur snang / /gos ngan sems ni zhan pa dang / /sen mo dang ni lus kyang ngan/ /

srin bu rnams kyis zos pa dang / /shu ba g.yan par yang dag ldan/ /mdo sde 'di ni rab spangs na/ /gang dang gang gis 'gro bar 'gro/ /de dang der ni skye ba na/ /blo ngan rmongs par skye bar 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ mig phye zhing mi 'dzums par thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i lha'i

bu rnams dang / 'byung po'i tshogs du ma chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus par shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ngo mtshar te/ mchog tu legs par gsungs pa

lags na/ de la bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can mi rigs pa'i chags pas zil gyis non pa slu bar byed pa nga rgyal can ma dad pa gya gyu can dmu rgod tshul khrims 'chal pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag sngags rnams kyi rtog pa'i

bdag nyid chen po rgyas pa grub pa dang / dus dang / yul dang / nges par sdom pa dang / sngags dang / spyod pa dang / /sbyin sreg dang / bzlas pa nges par sdom pa dang / cho ga rab 'byam dag la ma dad par 'gyur/ yid la mi byed

par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no/ /zhes byas nas spong bar 'gyur te/ de dag nyon mongs pa'i sems su gyur nas dus byed par 'gyur zhing / sdug bsngal drag cing tsha ba'i tshor ba myong zhing de dag dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur ro/ /

bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal ba'i sems can de dag la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la spyi bor byugs nas bka' stsal pa/ /

'jam dpal khyod sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir rab tu zhugs pa khyod yang legs so legs so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa de khyod yang legs so/ /'jam dpal gzhon

nur gyur pa de'i phyir legs par shin tu rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / lha dang / mi rnams dang / 'jig rten la rab tu brtse ba'i phyir ngas khyod la

bshad do/ /spyod pa thams cad la zhugs pa dang / byang chub kyi lam dang / thams cad shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sku la gnas par 'dod pa rnams kyis rig pa'i rgyal po mchog tu gsang

ba/ gzhon nu khyod kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang 'di dran par bya'o/ /de gang zhe na/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wa ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ ar had b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ o~M ku mA ra rU pi Ne/ bi shwa saM b+ha ba/ A gats+tsha/ A gats+tsha/ la hu la hu/

b+h+rU~M b+h+rU~M/ dzi na dzika many+dzu shri ye/ su shri ye/ tA ra ya mA~M/ sarba duHkhe b+h+yaH/ phaT phaT/ sha ma ya sha ma ya/ a mr-i tod+d+ha ba/ pA paM me nA sha ya swA hA/ 'jam dpal 'di ni khyod kyi snying po dam pa yin te/ zhi ba thams cad byed pa/ sdig pa

thams cad zad par byed pa/ sdug bsngal thams cad las rab tu grol bar byed pa/ tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / skal ba bzang po mchog dang / ngag gi dbang phyug skyed par byed pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad gzengs

stod par byed pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'di gsungs ma thag tu sa chen po ri dang rgya mtsho dang bcas pa/ sems can dang snod nye ba'i mthar thug pa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /'gro ba thams cad de

kyi 'gro ba dang / dud 'gro dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / dmyal ba'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu sbyangs shing / bde ba rnams kyang rab tu thob par 'gyur la/ 'jam dpal rig pa'i rgyal po 'di yang yid la byed cing /

de'i tshe dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems kyang med par 'gyur na/ bdud sdig to can gyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur la/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar yang sems bskyed par bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas dang / chos ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bsam pa'am/ gzhal ba'am/ spang bar ni bdag gis ci zhig nus te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal

gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ phan yon dang nyes dmigs kyi nus pa rab 'byam bstan pa'i le'u sum cu rtsa drug pa rdzogs so// //bcom ldan 'das

kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i steng na gnas pa'i lha'i bu'i tshogs rnams dang / sems can bye ba

khri phrag brgya stong du ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grub pa dang / rig 'dzin dang / drang srong mchog dam pa du ma dang / 'jam dpal

gzhon nur gyur pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dang / byams pa dang / mthu chen thob dang / mthu chen gnas dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dang /

chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i ngo bo dang 'dra bar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams thugs rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// //dpal lha

btsan po lha btsun pa byang chub 'od kyi bkas/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dge bsnyen chen po ku mA ra ka la sha dang / sgra sgyur gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
